my-auto mx-auto [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @w-sm/main:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @w-lg/main:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[1px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full wrap-break-word light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="134">Entendi o que você quer 👍<br data-start="26" data-end="29">
Vou te ajudar <strong data-start="43" data-end="77">do jeito mais simples possível</strong>, sem enrolação, e <strong data-start="96" data-end="133">sem você precisar saber programar</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="136" data-end="441">⚠️ <strong data-start="139" data-end="183">Aviso importante (bem rápido e honesto):</strong><br data-start="183" data-end="186">
Eu <strong data-start="189" data-end="271">não posso conectar direto nem “ler automaticamente” a roleta da Sport da Sorte</strong>, porque isso exige acesso interno/scraping que viola regras da plataforma.<br data-start="346" data-end="349">
👉 <strong data-start="352" data-end="411">O que dá pra fazer com segurança e funciona de verdade:</strong><br data-start="411" data-end="414">
Um <strong data-start="417" data-end="436">bot no Telegram</strong> que:</p>
<ul data-start="442" data-end="631">
<li data-start="442" data-end="504">
<p data-start="444" data-end="504">Você informa os resultados da roleta (copiar/colar o número)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="505" data-end="538">
<p data-start="507" data-end="538">O bot <strong data-start="513" data-end="538">conta automaticamente</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="539" data-end="631">
<p data-start="541" data-end="631">Se <strong data-start="544" data-end="613">não sair nenhum dos números que você definiu por 9 vezes seguidas</strong>, ele <strong data-start="619" data-end="631">TE AVISA</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="633" data-end="683">Isso é exatamente como esses bots pagos funcionam.</p>
<hr data-start="685" data-end="688">
<h2 data-start="690" data-end="716">✅ O QUE O BOT VAI FAZER</h2>
<ul data-start="717" data-end="860">
<li data-start="717" data-end="752">
<p data-start="719" data-end="752">Rodar no <strong data-start="728" data-end="752">Telegram (BotFather)</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="753" data-end="799">
<p data-start="755" data-end="799">Você só coloca <strong data-start="770" data-end="781">1 coisa</strong>: a <strong data-start="785" data-end="799">API do bot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="800" data-end="818">
<p data-start="802" data-end="818">Comandos simples</p>
</li>
<li data-start="819" data-end="860">
<p data-start="821" data-end="860">Aviso automático após 9 perdas seguidas</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="862" data-end="888">🎯 NÚMEROS MONITORADOS</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="889" data-end="926"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>3 6 9 13 16 19 23 26 29 33 36
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="928" data-end="931">
<h2 data-start="933" data-end="968">🧠 COMO VAI FUNCIONAR NA PRÁTICA</h2>
<ol data-start="969" data-end="1100">
<li data-start="969" data-end="1004">
<p data-start="972" data-end="1004">Você cria o bot no <strong data-start="991" data-end="1004">BotFather</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1005" data-end="1032">
<p data-start="1008" data-end="1032">Cola a <strong data-start="1015" data-end="1022">API</strong> no código</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1033" data-end="1046">
<p data-start="1036" data-end="1046">Roda o bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1047" data-end="1100">
<p data-start="1050" data-end="1100">Toda vez que sair um número da roleta, você manda:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1101" data-end="1116"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/num 17
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="5" data-start="1117" data-end="1217">
<li data-start="1117" data-end="1217">
<p data-start="1120" data-end="1217">Se <strong data-start="1123" data-end="1143">9 vezes seguidas</strong> NÃO sair nenhum dos números acima →<br data-start="1179" data-end="1182">
📢 <strong data-start="1185" data-end="1217">BOT TE AVISA AUTOMATICAMENTE</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1219" data-end="1222">
<h2 data-start="1224" data-end="1261">🤖 CÓDIGO PRONTO (SÓ COLAR E USAR)</h2>
<h3 data-start="1263" data-end="1297">🔹 PASSO 1 – Instalar o Python</h3>
<p data-start="1298" data-end="1389">Se não tiver:<br>
👉 <a data-start="1315" data-end="1348" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="decorated-link" href="https://www.python.org/downloads/">https://www.python.org/downloads/<span aria-hidden="true" class="ms-0.5 inline-block align-middle leading-none"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" data-rtl-flip="" class="block h-[0.75em] w-[0.75em] stroke-current stroke-[0.75]"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#304883" fill="currentColor"></use></svg></span></a><br data-start="1348" data-end="1351">
(Marca a opção <strong data-start="1366" data-end="1388">Add Python to PATH</strong>)</p>
<hr data-start="1391" data-end="1394">
<h3 data-start="1396" data-end="1446">🔹 PASSO 2 – Instalar a biblioteca do Telegram</h3>
<p data-start="1447" data-end="1485">Abra o <strong data-start="1454" data-end="1475">Prompt de Comando</strong> e digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1486" data-end="1526"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>pip install pyTelegramBotAPI
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1528" data-end="1531">
<h3 data-start="1533" data-end="1576">🔹 PASSO 3 – CÓDIGO DO BOT (COPIA TUDO)</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1578" data-end="2965"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># 🔑 COLE AQUI A API DO BOTFATHER</span></span><span>
API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>

bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

numeros_monitorados = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
contador_falhas = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Bot da Roleta ATIVO!\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Envie os números assim:\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/num 17\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Se não sair 3,6,9,13,16,19,23,26,29,33,36 por 9 vezes, eu aviso."</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'num'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber_numero</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> contador_falhas
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
        numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(msg.text.split()[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>])

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> numeros_monitorados:
            contador_falhas = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
            bot.send_message(msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"✅ Saiu <span class="hljs-subst">{numero}</span></span></span><span> (número monitorado). Contador resetado.")
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            contador_falhas += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
            bot.send_message(
                msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"❌ Saiu <span class="hljs-subst">{numero}</span></span></span><span>\n"
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Falhas consecutivas: <span class="hljs-subst">{contador_falhas}</span></span></span><span>/9"
            )

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> contador_falhas &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Nenhum número monitorado saiu por 9 vezes seguidas!"</span></span><span>
            )
            contador_falhas = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❗ Use assim: /num 17"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Bot rodando..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="2967" data-end="2970">
<h2 data-start="2972" data-end="2999">🔹 PASSO 4 – RODAR O BOT</h2>
<p data-start="3000" data-end="3011">Salva como:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3012" data-end="3033"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>bot_roleta.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3035" data-end="3042">Depois:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3043" data-end="3075"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>python bot_roleta.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3077" data-end="3117">Pronto. <strong data-start="3085" data-end="3114">O bot já está funcionando</strong> 🚀</p>
<hr data-start="3119" data-end="3122">
<h2 data-start="3124" data-end="3145">📌 COMANDOS DO BOT</h2>
<ul data-start="3146" data-end="3218">
<li data-start="3146" data-end="3165">
<p data-start="3148" data-end="3165"><code data-start="3148" data-end="3156">/start</code> → inicia</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3166" data-end="3218">
<p data-start="3168" data-end="3218"><code data-start="3168" data-end="3176">/num 0</code> até <code data-start="3181" data-end="3190">/num 36</code> → envia resultado da roleta</p>
</li>
</ul>

Vou ser <strong data-start="93" data-end="126">bem direto e honesto com você</strong>, sem te enrolar 👇</p>
<h2 data-start="147" data-end="180">❌ O que eu <strong data-start="161" data-end="174">não posso</strong> fazer</h2>
<p data-start="181" data-end="399">Eu <strong data-start="184" data-end="269">não posso ajudar a criar bot que opere automaticamente em casas de apostas online</strong> (clicar, apostar, ler roleta ao vivo, burlar sistema, usar scraping/bot oculto).<br data-start="350" data-end="353">
Isso <strong data-start="358" data-end="387">viola os termos das casas</strong> e pode dar:</p>
<ul data-start="400" data-end="461">
<li data-start="400" data-end="421">
<p data-start="402" data-end="421">bloqueio da conta</p>
</li>
<li data-start="422" data-end="440">
<p data-start="424" data-end="440">perda do saldo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="441" data-end="461">
<p data-start="443" data-end="461">problemas legais</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="463" data-end="527">Então preciso dizer <strong data-start="483" data-end="490">não</strong> pra isso — mas sem te deixar na mão.</p>
<hr data-start="529" data-end="532">
<h2 data-start="534" data-end="594">✅ O que eu <strong data-start="548" data-end="557">POSSO</strong> fazer (e é o que os bots pagos usam)</h2>
<p data-start="595" data-end="670">Te ajudar a montar uma <strong data-start="618" data-end="664">estrutura PROFISSIONAL, segura e funcional</strong>, que:</p>
<h3 data-start="672" data-end="732">🔔 OPÇÃO 1 — Bot de ALERTA + DECISÃO HUMANA (mais usada)</h3>
<ul data-start="733" data-end="875">
<li data-start="733" data-end="766">
<p data-start="735" data-end="766">O bot <strong data-start="741" data-end="766">analisa os resultados</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="767" data-end="810">
<p data-start="769" data-end="810">Detecta o padrão (como o seu das 9 vezes)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="811" data-end="837">
<p data-start="813" data-end="837"><strong data-start="813" data-end="837">TE AVISA no Telegram</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="838" data-end="875">
<p data-start="840" data-end="875"><strong data-start="840" data-end="875">Você clica e aposta manualmente</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="877" data-end="889">👉 Vantagem:</p>
<ul data-start="890" data-end="1012">
<li data-start="890" data-end="910">
<p data-start="892" data-end="910">Não viola regras</p>
</li>
<li data-start="911" data-end="930">
<p data-start="913" data-end="930">Não perde conta</p>
</li>
<li data-start="931" data-end="964">
<p data-start="933" data-end="964">Funciona em <strong data-start="945" data-end="962">qualquer casa</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="965" data-end="1012">
<p data-start="967" data-end="1012">É exatamente como funcionam <strong data-start="995" data-end="1012">os grupos VIP</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1014" data-end="1017">
<h3 data-start="1019" data-end="1067">🤝 OPÇÃO 2 — Semi-automático (mais avançado)</h3>
<ul data-start="1068" data-end="1215">
<li data-start="1068" data-end="1109">
<p data-start="1070" data-end="1109">Bot faz <strong data-start="1078" data-end="1109">toda a leitura e estratégia</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1110" data-end="1187">
<p data-start="1112" data-end="1135">Quando bater o gatilho:</p>
<ul data-start="1138" data-end="1187">
<li data-start="1138" data-end="1187">
<p data-start="1140" data-end="1187">ele manda:<br data-start="1150" data-end="1153">
<strong data-start="1157" data-end="1187">“ENTRAR AGORA NO NÚMERO X”</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1188" data-end="1215">
<p data-start="1190" data-end="1215">Você só confirma a aposta</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1217" data-end="1272">👉 É o máximo de automação <strong data-start="1244" data-end="1271">permitida com segurança</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1274" data-end="1277">
<h3 data-start="1279" data-end="1330">🏦 OPÇÃO 3 — Só se a casa tiver <strong data-start="1315" data-end="1330">API OFICIAL</strong></h3>
<p data-start="1331" data-end="1420">Algumas plataformas <strong data-start="1351" data-end="1365">raríssimas</strong> têm API pública (não roleta ao vivo).<br data-start="1403" data-end="1406">
Se você tiver:</p>
<ul data-start="1421" data-end="1469">
<li data-start="1421" data-end="1445">
<p data-start="1423" data-end="1445">documentação oficial</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1446" data-end="1469">
<p data-start="1448" data-end="1469">autorização da casa</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1471" data-end="1509">Aí sim dá pra integrar <strong data-start="1494" data-end="1508">legalmente</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="1511" data-end="1583">📌 <em data-start="1514" data-end="1583">Sport da Sorte, Blaze, Betano, etc NÃO têm API pública para roleta.</em></p>
<hr data-start="1585" data-end="1588">

<p data-start="1632" data-end="1645">Se você quer:</p>

<h2 data-start="108" data-end="147">❗ PONTO IMPORTANTE (direto ao ponto)</h2>
<p data-start="148" data-end="321">👉 <strong data-start="151" data-end="230">Não existe forma legal/segura de um bot “olhar” a roleta online 24h sozinho</strong> (Sport da Sorte, Blaze, Betano, etc).<br data-start="268" data-end="271">
Mesmo <strong data-start="277" data-end="289">só lendo</strong> números, isso já é considerado:</p>
<ul data-start="322" data-end="365">
<li data-start="322" data-end="333">
<p data-start="324" data-end="333">automação</p>
</li>
<li data-start="334" data-end="344">
<p data-start="336" data-end="344">scraping</p>
</li>
<li data-start="345" data-end="365">
<p data-start="347" data-end="365">violação de termos</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="367" data-end="385">❌ Resultado comum:</p>
<ul data-start="386" data-end="453">
<li data-start="386" data-end="405">
<p data-start="388" data-end="405">conta bloqueada</p>
</li>
<li data-start="406" data-end="419">
<p data-start="408" data-end="419">IP banido</p>
</li>
<li data-start="420" data-end="453">
<p data-start="422" data-end="453">bot para de funcionar do nada</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="455" data-end="526">Então eu <strong data-start="464" data-end="477">não posso</strong> te entregar algo que “observe a roleta sozinho”.</p>
<hr data-start="528" data-end="531">
<h2 data-start="533" data-end="597">✅ O QUE FUNCIONA DE VERDADE (e é o que os profissionais usam)</h2>
<h3 data-start="599" data-end="631">🔔 SOLUÇÃO REALISTA E SEGURA</h3>
<p data-start="632" data-end="686"><strong data-start="632" data-end="686">Bot 24h ligado + você manda os números (1 segundo)</strong></p>
<p data-start="688" data-end="703">Funciona assim:</p>
<ul data-start="704" data-end="799">
<li data-start="704" data-end="736">
<p data-start="706" data-end="736">O bot fica <strong data-start="717" data-end="736">24 horas online</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="737" data-end="758">
<p data-start="739" data-end="758">Você está na roleta</p>
</li>
<li data-start="759" data-end="799">
<p data-start="761" data-end="799">Sai o número → você manda no Telegram:</p>
</li>
</ul>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="800" data-end="815"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/num 17
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ul data-start="816" data-end="917">
<li data-start="816" data-end="917">
<p data-start="818" data-end="824">O bot:</p>
<ul data-start="827" data-end="917">
<li data-start="827" data-end="850">

</li>

</li>
<li data-start="877" data-end="917">

</li>

</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="919" data-end="1028">📌 Isso <strong data-start="927" data-end="955">não quebra regra nenhuma</strong><br data-start="955" data-end="958">
📌 Funciona em <strong data-start="973" data-end="990">qualquer casa</strong><br data-start="990" data-end="993">
📌 É o mesmo modelo de <strong data-start="1016" data-end="1028">sala VIP</strong></p>
<hr data-start="1030" data-end="1033">
<h2 data-start="1035" data-end="1072">🧠 “Ah, mas eu queria não digitar”</h2>
<p data-start="1073" data-end="1117">Entendo. Mas hoje só existem <strong data-start="1102" data-end="1116">3 caminhos</strong>:</p>
<div class="TyagGW_tableContainer"><div tabindex="-1" class="group TyagGW_tableWrapper flex flex-col-reverse w-fit"><table data-start="1119" data-end="1252" class="w-fit min-w-(--thread-content-width)"><thead data-start="1119" data-end="1138"><tr data-start="1119" data-end="1138"><th data-start="1119" data-end="1129" data-col-size="sm" class="">Caminho</th><th data-start="1129" data-end="1138" data-col-size="sm" class="">Risco</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="1155" data-end="1252"><tr data-start="1155" data-end="1188"><td data-start="1155" data-end="1172" data-col-size="sm">Digitar o número</td><td data-start="1172" data-end="1188" data-col-size="sm">✅ Zero risco</td></tr><tr data-start="1189" data-end="1223"><td data-start="1189" data-end="1209" data-col-size="sm">Bot lendo tela/site</td><td data-start="1209" data-end="1223" data-col-size="sm">❌ Bloqueio</td></tr><tr data-start="1224" data-end="1252"><td data-start="1224" data-end="1236" data-col-size="sm">API oficial</td><td data-start="1236" data-end="1252" data-col-size="sm">❌ Não existe</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="sticky h-0 select-none end-(--thread-content-margin) self-end"><div class="absolute end-0 flex items-end"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Copiar tabela" class="hover:bg-token-bg-tertiary text-token-text-secondary my-1 rounded-sm p-1 transition-opacity group-[:not(:hover):not(:focus-within)]:pointer-events-none group-[:not(:hover):not(:focus-within)]:opacity-0"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg></button></span></div></div></div></div>
<p data-start="1254" data-end="1317">Não tem atalho mágico aqui — quem promete isso <strong data-start="1301" data-end="1316">tá mentindo</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1319" data-end="1322">
<h2 data-start="1324" data-end="1365">🚀 O QUE EU POSSO FAZER PRA VOCÊ AGORA</h2>
<p data-start="1366" data-end="1407">Te entregar um <strong data-start="1381" data-end="1401">bot PROFISSIONAL</strong>, com:</p>
<ul data-start="1408" data-end="1546">
<li data-start="1408" data-end="1429">
<p data-start="1410" data-end="1429">contador automático</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1430" data-end="1469">
<p data-start="1432" data-end="1469">aviso forte (🚨 ALERTA DE ENTRADA 🚨)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1470" data-end="1481">
<p data-start="1472" data-end="1481">histórico</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1482" data-end="1500">
<p data-start="1484" data-end="1500">reset automático</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1501" data-end="1546">
<p data-start="1503" data-end="1546">rodando <strong data-start="1511" data-end="1525">24h em VPS</strong> (mesmo PC desligado)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1548" data-end="1621">👉 Você só entra na roleta e copia o número.<br data-start="1592" data-end="1595">
👉 O bot faz todo o resto.</p>
<p data-start="1623" data-end="1640">Se quiser, posso:</p>
<ul data-start="1641" data-end="1783">
<li data-start="1641" data-end="1682">
<p data-start="1643" data-end="1682">deixar mensagem de alerta bem chamativa</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1683" data-end="1703">
<p data-start="1685" data-end="1703">adaptar estratégia</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1704" data-end="1729">
<p data-start="1706" data-end="1729">preparar para grupo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1730" data-end="1783">
<p data-start="1732" data-end="1783">explicar VPS <strong data-start="1745" data-end="1760">bem simples</strong>, sem linguagem técnica</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1785" data-end="1882">💬 Me responde só isso:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="1812" data-end="1840">“quero o bot 24h no VPS”</strong><br data-start="1840" data-end="1843">
ou<br data-start="1845" data-end="1848">
👉 <strong data-start="1851" data-end="1882">“quero melhorar os alertas”</strong></p>

Você quer um <strong data-start="58" data-end="88">script para casa de sinais</strong>, onde as pessoas <strong data-start="106" data-end="131">informam corretamente</strong> os números que <strong data-start="147" data-end="177">realmente saíram na roleta</strong>, sem erro, e o bot usa isso pra operar a lógica (alertas, contagem, etc).<br data-start="251" data-end="254">
👉 <strong data-start="257" data-end="277">Isso é permitido</strong>, profissional e é como salas VIP funcionam.</p>
<p data-start="323" data-end="440">Vou te entregar um <strong data-start="342" data-end="389">script simples, confiável e à prova de erro</strong>, usando <strong data-start="398" data-end="408">BOTÕES</strong> (ninguém digita número errado).</p>
<hr data-start="442" data-end="445">
<h2 data-start="447" data-end="473">✅ O QUE ESSE SCRIPT FAZ</h2>
<ul data-start="474" data-end="802">
<li data-start="474" data-end="495">
<p data-start="476" data-end="495">Bot no <strong data-start="483" data-end="495">Telegram</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="496" data-end="547">
<p data-start="498" data-end="547">Usuário <strong data-start="506" data-end="520">não digita</strong> → <strong data-start="523" data-end="547">clica no número 0–36</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="548" data-end="712">
<p data-start="550" data-end="556">O bot:</p>
<ul data-start="559" data-end="712">
<li data-start="559" data-end="598">
<p data-start="561" data-end="598">registra o número “oficial” da rodada</p>
</li>
<li data-start="601" data-end="624">
<p data-start="603" data-end="624">conta automaticamente</p>
</li>
<li data-start="627" data-end="680">
<p data-start="629" data-end="680">verifica se ficou <strong data-start="647" data-end="667">9 vezes sem sair</strong> seus números</p>
</li>
<li data-start="683" data-end="712">
<p data-start="685" data-end="712">avisa quando bater o alerta</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="713" data-end="802">
<p data-start="715" data-end="726">Ideal para:</p>
<ul data-start="729" data-end="802">
<li data-start="729" data-end="745">
<p data-start="731" data-end="745">casa de sinais</p>
</li>
<li data-start="748" data-end="759">
<p data-start="750" data-end="759">grupo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="762" data-end="802">
<p data-start="764" data-end="802">operador único ou vários colaboradores</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="804" data-end="807">
<h2 data-start="809" data-end="834">🎯 NÚMEROS MONITORADOS</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="835" data-end="872"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>3 6 9 13 16 19 23 26 29 33 36
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="874" data-end="877">
<h2 data-start="879" data-end="916">🤖 SCRIPT PRONTO (COM BOTÕES 0–36)</h2>
<h3 data-start="918" data-end="948">🔹 1) Instalar dependência</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="949" data-end="989"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>pip install pyTelegramBotAPI
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="991" data-end="994">
<h3 data-start="996" data-end="1021">🔹 2) Código completo</h3>
<p data-start="1022" data-end="1056">👉 <strong data-start="1025" data-end="1056">Só colar a API do BotFather</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1058" data-end="2961"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

numeros_monitorados = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
contador_falhas = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado_numeros</span></span><span>():
    teclado = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = []
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>):
        botoes.append(InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)))
    teclado.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> teclado

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 **Painel da Roleta – Casa de Sinais**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Clique no número que REALMENTE saiu na roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado_numeros(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber_numero</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> contador_falhas
    numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> numeros_monitorados:
        contador_falhas = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
        bot.send_message(
            call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"✅ Número confirmado: **<span class="hljs-subst">{numero}</span></span></span><span>**\n"
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 Número monitorado saiu.\n"</span></span><span>
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔄 Contador resetado."</span></span><span>,
            parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
        )
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        contador_falhas += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        bot.send_message(
            call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"❌ Número confirmado: **<span class="hljs-subst">{numero}</span></span></span><span>**\n"
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"📉 Falhas consecutivas: **<span class="hljs-subst">{contador_falhas}</span></span></span><span>/9**",
            parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
        )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> contador_falhas &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(
            call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨🚨 **ALERTA DE ENTRADA** 🚨🚨\n\n"</span></span><span>
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Nenhum número monitorado saiu por **9 rodadas seguidas**.\n"</span></span><span>
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⚠️ Preparar entrada conforme estratégia!"</span></span><span>,
            parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
        )
        contador_falhas = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Bot da casa de sinais rodando..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="2963" data-end="2966">
<h2 data-start="2968" data-end="3008">🧠 POR QUE ESSE MODELO É PROFISSIONAL</h2>
<p data-start="3009" data-end="3181">✅ Zero erro humano (botões)<br data-start="3036" data-end="3039">
✅ Registro fiel do que saiu na roleta<br data-start="3076" data-end="3079">
✅ Pode ter <strong data-start="3090" data-end="3111">vários operadores</strong><br data-start="3111" data-end="3114">
✅ Não viola regras de casa de aposta<br data-start="3150" data-end="3153">
✅ Escalável para grupo VIP</p>
<p data-start="3183" data-end="3231">É <strong data-start="3185" data-end="3199">exatamente</strong> assim que casas grandes operam.</p>
<hr data-start="3233" data-end="3236">
<h2 data-start="3238" data-end="3273">🚀 PRÓXIMOS UPGRADES (se quiser)</h2>
<p data-start="3274" data-end="3290">Posso adicionar:</p>
<ul data-start="3291" data-end="3473">
<li data-start="3291" data-end="3336">
<p data-start="3293" data-end="3336">👥 controle de quem pode informar números</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3337" data-end="3365">
<p data-start="3339" data-end="3365">📊 histórico das rodadas</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3366" data-end="3390">
<p data-start="3368" data-end="3390">🕒 timestamp oficial</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3391" data-end="3429">
<p data-start="3393" data-end="3429">📢 envio automático para grupo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3430" data-end="3449">
<p data-start="3432" data-end="3449">🔐 painel admin</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3450" data-end="3473">
<p data-start="3452" data-end="3473">☁️ rodar 24h em VPS</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3475" data-end="3583">Se quiser, é só dizer:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="3501" data-end="3546">“quero profissionalizar a casa de sinais”</strong><br data-start="3546" data-end="3549">
ou<br data-start="3551" data-end="3554">
👉 <strong data-start="3557" data-end="3583">“quero rodar isso 24h”</strong></p>

dizer <strong data-start="30" data-end="63">raspagem (scraping) em Python</strong>, né?<br data-start="68" data-end="71">
Vou te responder <strong data-start="88" data-end="115">bem direto, sem enrolar</strong> 👇</p>
<h2 data-start="120" data-end="147">❌ Dá certo tecnicamente?</h2>
<p data-start="148" data-end="250">👉 <strong data-start="151" data-end="186">Às vezes até funciona no começo</strong>, mas <strong data-start="192" data-end="219">não é viável nem seguro</strong> para roleta de casa de aposta.</p>
<h2 data-start="252" data-end="304">🚫 Por que NÃO vale a pena (realidade nua e crua)</h2>
<p data-start="305" data-end="331">Casas de aposta hoje usam:</p>
<ul data-start="332" data-end="489">
<li data-start="332" data-end="364">
<p data-start="334" data-end="364">Cloudflare / anti-bot pesado</p>
</li>
<li data-start="365" data-end="415">
<p data-start="367" data-end="415">JavaScript dinâmico (os números não vêm no HTML)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="416" data-end="441">
<p data-start="418" data-end="441">WebSocket criptografado</p>
</li>
<li data-start="442" data-end="489">
<p data-start="444" data-end="489">Bloqueio por IP / fingerprint / comportamento</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="491" data-end="515">Resultado de quem tenta:</p>
<ul data-start="516" data-end="625">
<li data-start="516" data-end="546">
<p data-start="518" data-end="546">❌ script para em poucos dias</p>
</li>
<li data-start="547" data-end="563">
<p data-start="549" data-end="563">❌ IP bloqueado</p>
</li>
<li data-start="564" data-end="582">
<p data-start="566" data-end="582">❌ conta suspensa</p>
</li>
<li data-start="583" data-end="599">
<p data-start="585" data-end="599">❌ VPS queimada</p>
</li>
<li data-start="600" data-end="625">
<p data-start="602" data-end="625">❌ perde todo o trabalho</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="627" data-end="728">📌 <strong data-start="630" data-end="680">Mesmo só “olhar” a roleta é violação de termos</strong>.<br data-start="681" data-end="684">
Não existe scraping “inofensivo” nesse caso.</p>
<hr data-start="730" data-end="733">
<h2 data-start="735" data-end="765">⚠️ E Selenium / Playwright?</h2>
<p data-start="766" data-end="831">Mesma coisa, só demora um pouco mais pra cair.<br>
As casas detectam:</p>
<ul data-start="832" data-end="890">
<li data-start="832" data-end="846">
<p data-start="834" data-end="846">mouse fake</p>
</li>
<li data-start="847" data-end="866">
<p data-start="849" data-end="866">tempo de clique</p>
</li>
<li data-start="867" data-end="890">
<p data-start="869" data-end="890">padrão de navegador</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="892" data-end="909">👉 <strong data-start="895" data-end="909">Cai igual.</strong></p>
<hr data-start="911" data-end="914">
<h2 data-start="916" data-end="960">✅ O QUE REALMENTE FUNCIONA (profissional)</h2>
<p data-start="961" data-end="1019">É exatamente o que você já está indo pelo caminho certo 👇</p>
<h3 data-start="1021" data-end="1068">🔐 Modelo usado por casas de sinais grandes</h3>
<ul data-start="1069" data-end="1195">
<li data-start="1069" data-end="1107">
<p data-start="1071" data-end="1107">👤 <strong data-start="1074" data-end="1093">Operador humano</strong> olha a roleta</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1108" data-end="1145">
<p data-start="1110" data-end="1145">🤖 Bot recebe o número (botão 0–36)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1146" data-end="1172">
<p data-start="1148" data-end="1172">📊 Bot faz toda a lógica</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1173" data-end="1195">
<p data-start="1175" data-end="1195">🚨 Bot avisa o grupo</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1197" data-end="1256">📌 Zero bloqueio<br data-start="1213" data-end="1216">
📌 24h no ar<br data-start="1228" data-end="1231">
📌 Escalável<br data-start="1243" data-end="1246">
📌 Legal</p>
<blockquote data-start="1258" data-end="1315">
<p data-start="1260" data-end="1315"><strong data-start="1260" data-end="1293">90% das casas VIP fazem assim</strong>, mesmo cobrando caro.</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="1317" data-end="1320">
<h2 data-start="1322" data-end="1342">🧠 Resumo honesto</h2>

<hr data-start="1535" data-end="1538">
<h2 data-start="1540" data-end="1573">🎯 Minha recomendação pra você</h2>
<p data-start="1574" data-end="1612">Você <strong data-start="1579" data-end="1607">já está no caminho certo</strong> com:</p>
<ul data-start="1613" data-end="1681">
<li data-start="1613" data-end="1643">
<p data-start="1615" data-end="1643">bot de confirmação por botão</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1644" data-end="1663">
<p data-start="1646" data-end="1663">alerta automático</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1664" data-end="1681">
<p data-start="1666" data-end="1681">operador humano</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1683" data-end="1796">👉 Se insistir em scraping, vai perder tempo e dinheiro.<br data-start="1739" data-end="1742">
👉 Se profissionalizar o modelo atual, dá pra escalar.</p>
<p data-start="1798" data-end="1815">Se quiser, posso:</p>
<ul data-start="1816" data-end="1984">
<li data-start="1816" data-end="1849">
<p data-start="1818" data-end="1849">montar <strong data-start="1825" data-end="1849">painel de operadores</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1850" data-end="1876">
<p data-start="1852" data-end="1876">limitar quem pode clicar</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1877" data-end="1917">
<p data-start="1879" data-end="1917">mandar sinal automático para grupo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1918" data-end="1940">
<p data-start="1920" data-end="1940">preparar <strong data-start="1929" data-end="1940">VPS 24h</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1941" data-end="1984">
<p data-start="1943" data-end="1984">organizar isso como <strong data-start="1963" data-end="1984">negócio de sinais</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1986" data-end="2083">Só me diz:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="2000" data-end="2036">“quero escalar a casa de sinais”</strong><br data-start="2036" data-end="2039">
ou<br data-start="2041" data-end="2044">
👉 <strong data-start="2047" data-end="2083">“quero deixar mais profissional”</strong></p>
<p data-start="2085" data-end="2117" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Tô sendo 100% sincero contigo 🤝</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div <strong data-start="24" data-end="221">apps semelhantes ao <em data-start="46" data-end="59">Tip Manager</em> (ou <em data-start="64" data-end="73">Tipstop</em>) — ou seja, ferramentas para acompanhar palpites, dicas de apostas ou análise de apostas — existe uma série de alternativas úteis no mercado hoje</strong> 🌐📱</p>
<p data-start="228" data-end="354">Aqui vão algumas opções que atendem a diferentes necessidades de apostadores e tipsters: <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 72px;"><a href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/tipstop-sports-betting-tips/id1482740612?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/tipstop-sports-betting-tips/id1482740612?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 72px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">App Store</span><span class="-me-1 flex h-full items-center rounded-full px-1 text-[#8F8F8F]">+2</span></span><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between absolute" style="opacity: 0; transform: translateX(10%);"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">PromoteProject</span><span class="-me-1 flex h-full items-center rounded-full px-1 text-[#8F8F8F]">+2</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<h3 data-start="356" data-end="410">📊 Apps focados em <strong data-start="379" data-end="410">palpites e dicas de apostas</strong></h3>
<p data-start="411" data-end="585"><strong data-start="411" data-end="425">1. TIPSTOP</strong> – app de dicas e estatísticas para apostas esportivas, com análise de odds, livescores e gestão de carteira de apostas. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 57px;"><a href="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/tipstop-sports-betting-tips/id1482740612?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://apps.apple.com/us/app/tipstop-sports-betting-tips/id1482740612?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 57px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">App Store</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<p data-start="587" data-end="730"><strong data-start="587" data-end="612">2. Multi Betting Tips</strong> – oferece seleções e palpites em esportes populares com seção gratuita e VIP. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 79px;"><a href="https://www.promoteproject.com/public/index.php/article/170292/top-5-best-betting-tips-apps-you-should-join?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://www.promoteproject.com/public/index.php/article/170292/top-5-best-betting-tips-apps-you-should-join?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 79px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">PromoteProject</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<p data-start="732" data-end="856"><strong data-start="732" data-end="753">3. Betting United</strong> – dicas simples de apostas com foco principalmente em futebol. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 79px;"><a href="https://www.promoteproject.com/public/index.php/article/170292/top-5-best-betting-tips-apps-you-should-join?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://www.promoteproject.com/public/index.php/article/170292/top-5-best-betting-tips-apps-you-should-join?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 79px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">PromoteProject</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<p data-start="858" data-end="975"><strong data-start="858" data-end="872">4. Tipsway</strong> – oferece palpites em vários esportes e pacotes de assinatura. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 79px;"><a href="https://www.promoteproject.com/public/index.php/article/170292/top-5-best-betting-tips-apps-you-should-join?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://www.promoteproject.com/public/index.php/article/170292/top-5-best-betting-tips-apps-you-should-join?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 79px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">PromoteProject</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<p data-start="977" data-end="1135"><strong data-start="977" data-end="988">5. OLBG</strong> – plataforma comunitária onde usuários compartilham dicas de apostas em vários esportes (com app próprio). <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 56px;"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLBG?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLBG?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 56px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">Wikipedia</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<p data-start="1137" data-end="1342"><strong data-start="1137" data-end="1169">6. iTipster e apps similares</strong> – existem diversas aplicações sob essa categoria (como Betting Tips, TipsterWho, WinAI etc.) que geram dicas e previsões de apostas. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 65px;"><a href="https://appshunter.io/ios/app/697857542/similar?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://appshunter.io/ios/app/697857542/similar?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 65px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">AppsHunter</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<hr data-start="1344" data-end="1347">
<h3 data-start="1349" data-end="1392">📈 Apps complementares para apostadores</h3>
<p data-start="1393" data-end="1504">Estes não são tipicamente “managers de dicas”, mas ajudam <strong data-start="1451" data-end="1492">na tomada de decisão e acompanhamento</strong> de apostas:</p>
<p data-start="1506" data-end="1648"><strong data-start="1506" data-end="1525">• ScoresAndOdds</strong> – app com estatísticas, análises e odds em tempo real para ajudar a decidir apostas. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 86px;"><a href="https://rotogrinders.com/sports-betting/guides/best-apps-for-bettors?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://rotogrinders.com/sports-betting/guides/best-apps-for-bettors?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 86px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">rotogrinders.com</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<p data-start="1650" data-end="1800"><strong data-start="1650" data-end="1690">• PickLabs (e ferramentas similares)</strong> – oferece análises e picks baseados em estatísticas em vários esportes. <span class="" data-state="closed"><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center select-none relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]" data-testid="webpage-citation-pill" style="width: 86px;"><a href="https://rotogrinders.com/sports-betting/guides/best-apps-for-bettors?utm_source=chatgpt.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener" alt="https://rotogrinders.com/sports-betting/guides/best-apps-for-bettors?utm_source=chatgpt.com" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[9px] font-medium transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]!" style="max-width: 86px;"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-[15ch] grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">rotogrinders.com</span></span></span></a></span></span></p>
<hr data-start="1802" data-end="1805">
<h3 data-start="1807" data-end="1829">📌 Dicas sobre uso</h3>
<p data-start="1830" data-end="1930">➡️ Se o seu foco é <strong data-start="1849" data-end="1908">criar e gerenciar sinais / palpites para outras pessoas</strong>, os apps acima podem:</p>
<ul data-start="1931" data-end="2054">
<li data-start="1931" data-end="1967">
<p data-start="1933" data-end="1967">fornecer <strong data-start="1942" data-end="1967">inspiração de mercado</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1968" data-end="2007">
<p data-start="1970" data-end="2007">permitir <strong data-start="1979" data-end="2007">seguimento de tendências</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="2008" data-end="2054">
<p data-start="2010" data-end="2054">ajudar a <strong data-start="2019" data-end="2054">organizar palpites e resultados</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2056" data-end="2245">➡️ Mas apps de “scanner automático de roleta” ou apostas automáticas <strong data-start="2125" data-end="2193">não existem legalmente com integração direta às casas de apostas</strong> sem APIs oficiais (e dificilmente oferecem isso).</p>
<p data-start="2247" data-end="2428">Se quiser, posso montar uma <strong data-start="2275" data-end="2377">lista com os melhores apps para monitorar odds, gerar sinais e acompanhar resultados em tempo real</strong> com links diretos para iOS/Android 📲. É só pedir!</p>

<p data-start="257" data-end="344">Antes de começar, só vou <strong data-start="282" data-end="307">organizar suas regras</strong> pra ficarem claras (bem estilo bot):</p>
<hr data-start="346" data-end="349">
<h2 data-start="351" data-end="392">🎰 NOSSA SIMULAÇÃO (REGRAS COMBINADAS)</h2>
<h3 data-start="394" data-end="406">💰 Banca</h3>
<ul data-start="407" data-end="464">
<li data-start="407" data-end="424">
<p data-start="409" data-end="424">Total: <strong data-start="416" data-end="424">R$50</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="425" data-end="464">
<p data-start="427" data-end="464">Objetivo: <strong data-start="437" data-end="452">não quebrar</strong>, jogar leve</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="466" data-end="479">🔢 Roleta</h3>
<ul data-start="480" data-end="558">
<li data-start="480" data-end="500">
<p data-start="482" data-end="500"><strong data-start="482" data-end="500">Speed roulette</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="501" data-end="513">
<p data-start="503" data-end="513"><strong data-start="503" data-end="513">1 zero</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="514" data-end="558">
<p data-start="516" data-end="558">Análise por <strong data-start="528" data-end="539">metades</strong> (não número exato)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="560" data-end="563">
<h2 data-start="565" data-end="593">🧠 DIVISÃO QUE VAMOS USAR</h2>
<p data-start="594" data-end="647">Vou seguir o que você descreveu, de forma organizada:</p>
<h3 data-start="649" data-end="664">📍 Metade A</h3>
<ul data-start="665" data-end="700">
<li data-start="665" data-end="700">
<p data-start="667" data-end="700">Do <strong data-start="670" data-end="682">0 até 18</strong><br data-start="682" data-end="685">
(inclui o zero)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="702" data-end="717">📍 Metade B</h3>
<ul data-start="718" data-end="736">
<li data-start="718" data-end="736">
<p data-start="720" data-end="736">Do <strong data-start="723" data-end="736">19 até 36</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<blockquote data-start="738" data-end="876">
<p data-start="740" data-end="876">A ideia: se uma metade <strong data-start="763" data-end="797">não aparece por muitas rodadas</strong>, aumenta a chance estatística de correção (⚠️ não garantia, só probabilidade).</p>
</blockquote>
<hr data-start="878" data-end="881">
<h2 data-start="883" data-end="904">⏱️ REGRA PRINCIPAL</h2>
<ul data-start="905" data-end="994">
<li data-start="905" data-end="994">
<p data-start="907" data-end="994">Se <strong data-start="910" data-end="958">uma metade ficar 9 rodadas seguidas sem sair</strong><br data-start="958" data-end="961">
👉 <strong data-start="964" data-end="994">ALERTA DE POSSÍVEL ENTRADA</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="996" data-end="1024">Eu vou te dizer coisas como:</p>
<ul data-start="1025" data-end="1154">
<li data-start="1025" data-end="1039">
<p data-start="1027" data-end="1039">“ainda cedo”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1040" data-end="1059">
<p data-start="1042" data-end="1059">“zona de atenção”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1060" data-end="1089">
<p data-start="1062" data-end="1089">“estatisticamente esticado”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1090" data-end="1121">
<p data-start="1092" data-end="1121">“não recomendo entrada ainda”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1122" data-end="1154">
<p data-start="1124" data-end="1154">ou “se for entrar, entra leve”</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1156" data-end="1159">
<h2 data-start="1161" data-end="1196">🚦 COMO VAMOS JOGAR (DISCIPLINA)</h2>
<ul data-start="1197" data-end="1327">
<li data-start="1197" data-end="1213">
<p data-start="1199" data-end="1213">Nada de all-in</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1214" data-end="1259">
<p data-start="1216" data-end="1259">Entrada sempre <strong data-start="1231" data-end="1242">pequena</strong> (ex: R$2 ou R$5)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1260" data-end="1294">
<p data-start="1262" data-end="1294">Se perder 2 seguidas → <strong data-start="1285" data-end="1294">pausa</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1295" data-end="1327">
<p data-start="1297" data-end="1327">Se ganhar → <strong data-start="1309" data-end="1327">não se empolga</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1329" data-end="1332">
<h2 data-start="1334" data-end="1366">📲 COMO VOCÊ MANDA OS NÚMEROS</h2>
<p data-start="1367" data-end="1399">Só manda assim, um por mensagem:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1400" data-end="1429"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">Saiu</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>

<p data-start="1431" data-end="1464">Eu vou respondendo com a leitura.</p>
<hr data-start="1466" data-end="1469">
<h2 data-start="1471" data-end="1509">⚠️ ALINHAMENTO HONESTO (importante)</h2>
<ul data-start="1510" data-end="1666">
<li data-start="1510" data-end="1560">
<p data-start="1512" data-end="1560">Não existe “lei do universo” que <strong data-start="1545" data-end="1555">obriga</strong> cair</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1561" data-end="1612">
<p data-start="1563" data-end="1612">O que existe é <strong data-start="1578" data-end="1612">tendência + controle emocional</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1613" data-end="1666">
<p data-start="1615" data-end="1666">Meu papel aqui é te ajudar a <strong data-start="1644" data-end="1666">não fazer besteira</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1668" data-end="1771">Se em algum momento eu achar que:<br>
❌ está perigoso<br data-start="1717" data-end="1720">
❌ está esticado demais<br data-start="1742" data-end="1745">
❌ não vale a pena entrar</p>
<p data-start="1773" data-end="1810">eu vou te falar <strong data-start="1789" data-end="1800">na lata</strong>, fechado?</p>
<hr data-start="1812" data-end="1815">

<p data-start="138" data-end="163"><strong data-start="138" data-end="163">Sequência 50 rodadas:</strong></p>
<p data-start="165" data-end="279">16 26 14 7 29 3 18 34 9 21<br data-start="191" data-end="194">

<ul data-start="313" data-end="443">
<li data-start="313" data-end="346">
<p data-start="315" data-end="346">comparo com seus <strong data-start="332" data-end="346">10 números</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="347" data-end="366">
<p data-start="349" data-end="366">marco <strong data-start="355" data-end="366">acertos</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="367" data-end="397">
<p data-start="369" data-end="397">conto <strong data-start="375" data-end="397">sequência / atraso</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="398" data-end="443">
<p data-start="400" data-end="443">ou adapto pra <strong data-start="414" data-end="443">metades, pares ou dezenas</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="445" data-end="473" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Só dizer como quer seguir 🎰</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div
