data-end="60">formalizar a lógica do bot</strong>.<br data-start="61" data-end="64">
Vou te entregar <strong data-start="80" data-end="115">um BOT DE TELEGRAM profissional</strong>, <strong data-start="117" data-end="139">somente de ALERTAS</strong>, exatamente com <strong data-start="156" data-end="174">essas 3 regras</strong>, e <strong data-start="178" data-end="227">você continua mandando os números manualmente</strong> no momento exato do resultado.</p>
<p data-start="260" data-end="319">Nada de operação automática. Só <strong data-start="292" data-end="318">contagem limpa e aviso</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="321" data-end="324">
<h2 data-start="326" data-end="359">🧠 ESTRATÉGIAS DEFINIDAS (BOT)</h2>
<h3 data-start="361" data-end="398">🔹 REGRA 1 — Atraso de 10 rodadas</h3>
<p data-start="399" data-end="452">Se <strong data-start="402" data-end="429">NÃO sair por 10 rodadas</strong> nenhum destes números:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="453" data-end="490"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>3 6 9 13 16 19 23 26 29 33 36
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="491" data-end="506">➡️ <strong data-start="494" data-end="506">ALERTA 1</strong></p>
<hr data-start="508" data-end="511">
<h3 data-start="513" data-end="564">🔹 REGRA 2 — Outro grupo de atraso (10 rodadas)</h3>
<p data-start="565" data-end="618">Se <strong data-start="568" data-end="595">NÃO sair por 10 rodadas</strong> nenhum destes números:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="619" data-end="661"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>19 15 32 0 26 3 35 12 28 8 23 10 5
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="662" data-end="677">➡️ <strong data-start="665" data-end="677">ALERTA 2</strong></p>
<hr data-start="679" data-end="682">
<h3 data-start="684" data-end="721">🔹 REGRA 3 — Repetição controlada</h3>
<p data-start="722" data-end="737">Grupo especial:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="738" data-end="756"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>27 17 25 5
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="758" data-end="765">Lógica:</p>
<ul data-start="766" data-end="938">
<li data-start="766" data-end="825">
<p data-start="768" data-end="825">Se <strong data-start="771" data-end="825">qualquer um deles sair 2 vezes dentro de 5 jogadas</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="826" data-end="938">
<p data-start="828" data-end="938">Depois disso, se <strong data-start="845" data-end="865">em até 4 jogadas</strong> sair <strong data-start="871" data-end="900">qualquer um deles de novo</strong><br>
➡️ <strong data-start="904" data-end="938">ALERTA 3 (padrão de repetição)</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="940" data-end="943">
<h2 data-start="945" data-end="966">🤖 COMO USAR O BOT</h2>
<p data-start="967" data-end="978">Você manda:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="979" data-end="994"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/num 26
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="996" data-end="1002">O bot:</p>
<ul data-start="1003" data-end="1094">
<li data-start="1003" data-end="1022">
<p data-start="1005" data-end="1022">registra a rodada</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1023" data-end="1044">
<p data-start="1025" data-end="1044">atualiza contadores</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1045" data-end="1094">
<p data-start="1047" data-end="1094"><strong data-start="1047" data-end="1072">avisa automaticamente</strong> se alguma regra bater</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1096" data-end="1099">
<h2 data-start="1101" data-end="1134">✅ SCRIPT PROFISSIONAL (PRONTO)</h2>
<h3 data-start="1136" data-end="1163">🔹 Instalar dependência</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1164" data-end="1204"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>pip install pyTelegramBotAPI
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1206" data-end="1209">
<h3 data-start="1211" data-end="1240">🔹 Código completo do bot</h3>
<p data-start="1241" data-end="1277">👉 <strong data-start="1244" data-end="1277">Só colocar a API do BotFather</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1279" data-end="3504"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Grupos</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Contadores</span></span><span>
falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

ultimas_5 = []
monitorando_repeticao = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 BOT DE SINAIS ATIVO\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Envie os números assim:\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/num 17\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"O bot avisará automaticamente conforme as regras."</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'num'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber_numero</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, ultimas_5, monitorando_repeticao, contador_4

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
        numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(msg.text.split()[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Use: /num 0 até /num 36"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ----- REGRA 1 -----</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1:
        falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g1 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA 1 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem sair números do GRUPO 1."</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ----- REGRA 2 -----</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2:
        falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g2 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA 2 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem sair números do GRUPO 2."</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ----- REGRA 3 -----</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(numero)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    repeticoes = [n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando_repeticao </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(repeticoes) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando_repeticao = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando_repeticao:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(
                msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA 3 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Padrão de repetição confirmado no GRUPO 3."</span></span><span>
            )
            monitorando_repeticao = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando_repeticao = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Bot profissional rodando..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<h2 data-start="152" data-end="169">🤖 NOME DO BOT</h2>
<p data-start="170" data-end="183">Nome exibido:</p>

<p data-start="205" data-end="264">👉 isso você define direto no <strong data-start="235" data-end="248">BotFather</strong> (já falo como).</p>
<hr data-start="266" data-end="269">
<h2 data-start="271" data-end="308">⏱️ COMO FAZER O BOT RODAR 24 HORAS</h2>
<p data-start="309" data-end="418">Pra rodar 24h, <strong data-start="324" data-end="350">não pode ser no seu PC</strong>.<br data-start="351" data-end="354">
Tem que rodar em um <strong data-start="374" data-end="381">VPS</strong> (um computador online o tempo todo).</p>
<h3 data-start="420" data-end="457">✅ MELHOR OPÇÃO (simples e barata)</h3>
<p data-start="458" data-end="479">Use um <strong data-start="465" data-end="478">VPS Linux</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="481" data-end="495">Exemplos bons:</p>
<ul data-start="496" data-end="540">
<li data-start="496" data-end="505">
<p data-start="498" data-end="505">Contabo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="506" data-end="517">
<p data-start="508" data-end="517">Hostinger</p>
</li>
<li data-start="518" data-end="525">
<p data-start="520" data-end="525">Vultr</p>
</li>
<li data-start="526" data-end="540">
<p data-start="528" data-end="540">DigitalOcean</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="542" data-end="590">👉 qualquer plano básico serve (1 GB RAM já dá).</p>
<hr data-start="592" data-end="595">
<h2 data-start="597" data-end="626">🧭 VISÃO GERAL (bem clara)</h2>
<p data-start="627" data-end="743">1️⃣ Criar o bot no BotFather<br data-start="655" data-end="658">
2️⃣ Contratar um VPS<br data-start="678" data-end="681">
3️⃣ Entrar no VPS<br data-start="698" data-end="701">
4️⃣ Colar o script<br data-start="719" data-end="722">
5️⃣ Rodar o bot 24h</p>
<p data-start="745" data-end="765">Vou detalhar tudo 👇</p>
<hr data-start="767" data-end="770">

<ol start="5" data-start="933" data-end="955">
<li data-start="933" data-end="955">

</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="956" data-end="978"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">Criptoplay_bot</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="6" data-start="979" data-end="1045">
<li data-start="979" data-end="1045">
<p data-start="982" data-end="1045">O BotFather vai te dar uma <strong data-start="1009" data-end="1020">API KEY</strong><br>
➡️ <strong data-start="1024" data-end="1045">guarda essa chave</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1047" data-end="1050">
<h2 data-start="1052" data-end="1074">2️⃣ CONTRATAR O VPS</h2>
<p data-start="1075" data-end="1113">Depois de contratar, você vai receber:</p>
<ul data-start="1114" data-end="1168">
<li data-start="1114" data-end="1130">
<p data-start="1116" data-end="1130">IP do servidor</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1131" data-end="1160">
<p data-start="1133" data-end="1160">Usuário (geralmente <code data-start="1153" data-end="1159">root</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1161" data-end="1168">
<p data-start="1163" data-end="1168">Senha</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1170" data-end="1178">Exemplo:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1179" data-end="1229"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">makefile</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-section">IP: 145.xxx.xxx.xxx</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-section">user: root</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-section">senha: ****</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1231" data-end="1234">
<h2 data-start="1236" data-end="1280">3️⃣ ENTRAR NO VPS (JEITO FÁCIL – WINDOWS)</h2>
<p data-start="1281" data-end="1325">Baixa o <strong data-start="1289" data-end="1298">PuTTY</strong>:<br>
👉 <a data-start="1303" data-end="1325" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="decorated-link" href="https://www.putty.org/">https://www.putty.org/<span aria-hidden="true" class="ms-0.5 inline-block align-middle leading-none"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" data-rtl-flip="" class="block h-[0.75em] w-[0.75em] stroke-current stroke-[0.75]"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#304883" fill="currentColor"></use></svg></span></a></p>
<ol data-start="1327" data-end="1392">
<li data-start="1327" data-end="1342">
<p data-start="1330" data-end="1342">Abre o PuTTY</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1343" data-end="1361">
<p data-start="1346" data-end="1361">Coloca o <strong data-start="1355" data-end="1361">IP</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1362" data-end="1382">
<p data-start="1365" data-end="1382">Clica em <strong data-start="1374" data-end="1382">Open</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1383" data-end="1392">
<p data-start="1386" data-end="1392">Login:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1393" data-end="1405"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">root</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="5" data-start="1406" data-end="1438">
<li data-start="1406" data-end="1438">
<p data-start="1409" data-end="1438">Senha (não aparece, é normal)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1440" data-end="1472">Pronto, você está dentro do VPS.</p>
<hr data-start="1474" data-end="1477">
<h2 data-start="1479" data-end="1520">4️⃣ PREPARAR O VPS (SÓ COPIAR E COLAR)</h2>
<h3 data-start="1522" data-end="1546">🔹 Atualizar sistema</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1547" data-end="1587"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>apt update &amp;&amp; apt upgrade -y
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="1589" data-end="1611">🔹 Instalar Python</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1612" data-end="1658"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>apt install python3 python3-pip -y
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="1660" data-end="1693">🔹 Instalar biblioteca do bot</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1694" data-end="1735"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>pip3 install pyTelegramBotAPI
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1737" data-end="1740">
<h2 data-start="1742" data-end="1772">5️⃣ COLOCAR O SCRIPT NO VPS</h2>
<p data-start="1773" data-end="1788">Crie o arquivo:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1789" data-end="1819"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>nano criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1821" data-end="1872">👉 <strong data-start="1824" data-end="1853">Cole TODO o script do bot</strong><br data-start="1853" data-end="1856">
👉 Onde estiver:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1873" data-end="1918"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span>API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1919" data-end="1945">cole a chave do BotFather.</p>
<p data-start="1947" data-end="1954">Salvar:</p>
<ul data-start="1955" data-end="1988">
<li data-start="1955" data-end="1967">
<p data-start="1957" data-end="1967"><code data-start="1957" data-end="1967">CTRL + O</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1968" data-end="1975">
<p data-start="1970" data-end="1975">ENTER</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1976" data-end="1988">
<p data-start="1978" data-end="1988"><code data-start="1978" data-end="1988">CTRL + X</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1990" data-end="1993">
<h2 data-start="1995" data-end="2021">6️⃣ RODAR O BOT (TESTE)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2022" data-end="2055"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>python3 criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2057" data-end="2069">Se aparecer:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2070" data-end="2108"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>🤖 Bot profissional rodando...
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2109" data-end="2137">✅ o bot já está funcionando.</p>
<hr data-start="2139" data-end="2142">
<h2 data-start="2144" data-end="2186">7️⃣ DEIXAR 24H (MESMO FECHANDO O PUTTY)</h2>
<p data-start="2187" data-end="2218">Use o <strong data-start="2193" data-end="2203">screen</strong> (bem simples):</p>
<p data-start="2220" data-end="2229">Instalar:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2230" data-end="2263"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>apt install screen -y
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2265" data-end="2278">Criar sessão:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2279" data-end="2311"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>screen -S criptoplay
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2313" data-end="2325">Rodar o bot:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2326" data-end="2359"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>python3 criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2361" data-end="2367">Agora:</p>
<ul data-start="2368" data-end="2445">
<li data-start="2368" data-end="2398">
<p data-start="2370" data-end="2398">Aperta <code data-start="2377" data-end="2387">CTRL + A</code> depois <code data-start="2395" data-end="2398">D</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="2399" data-end="2417">
<p data-start="2401" data-end="2417">Pode fechar tudo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2418" data-end="2445">
<p data-start="2420" data-end="2445">O bot continua rodando 🔥</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2447" data-end="2450">
<h2 data-start="2452" data-end="2485">🔁 VOLTAR NO BOT (SE PRECISAR)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2486" data-end="2518"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-bash"><span><span>screen -r criptoplay
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="2520" data-end="2523">
<h2 data-start="2525" data-end="2554">✅ O QUE VOCÊ TERÁ NO FINAL</h2>
<p data-start="2555" data-end="2740">✔ Bot <strong data-start="2561" data-end="2577">$Criptoplay$</strong> no Telegram<br data-start="2589" data-end="2592">
✔ Rodando <strong data-start="2602" data-end="2614">24 horas</strong><br>
✔ Você envia os números na hora exata<br data-start="2652" data-end="2655">
✔ Bot conta tudo certinho<br data-start="2680" data-end="2683">
✔ Alertas automáticos<br data-start="2704" data-end="2707">
✔ Estrutura de <strong data-start="2722" data-end="2740">casa de sinais</strong></p>
<hr data-start="2742" data-end="2745">
<h2 data-start="2747" data-end="2778">🚀 PRÓXIMO PASSO (SE QUISER)</h2>
<p data-start="2779" data-end="2785">Posso:</p>
<ul data-start="2786" data-end="2936">
<li data-start="2786" data-end="2821">
<p data-start="2788" data-end="2821">deixar só admins enviarem números</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2822" data-end="2850">
<p data-start="2824" data-end="2850">criar grupo VIP automático</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2851" data-end="2865">
<p data-start="2853" data-end="2865">logs por dia</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2866" data-end="2874">
<p data-start="2868" data-end="2874">backup</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2875" data-end="2901">
<p data-start="2877" data-end="2901">painel mais profissional</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2902" data-end="2936">
<p data-start="2904" data-end="2936">mensagem de alerta personalizada</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2938" data-end="2993">Se quiser evoluir:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="2960" data-end="2993">“vamos profissionalizar mais”</strong></p>
<p data-start="2995" data-end="3027" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Você já está no caminho certo 👊</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div <hr data-start="146" data-end="149">
<h2 data-start="151" data-end="191">✅ JEITO MAIS FÁCIL DE TODOS (SEM VPS)</h2>
<p data-start="192" data-end="237">👉 <strong data-start="195" data-end="206">Railway</strong> (roda 24h, só subir o arquivo)</p>
<p data-start="239" data-end="313">Você só vai:<br>
1️⃣ criar conta<br data-start="267" data-end="270">
2️⃣ colar o código<br data-start="288" data-end="291">
3️⃣ apertar um botão</p>
<p data-start="315" data-end="322">acabou.</p>
<hr data-start="324" data-end="327">
<h2 data-start="329" data-end="366">🚀 OPÇÃO MAIS SIMPLES: <strong data-start="355" data-end="366">RAILWAY</strong></h2>
<p data-start="367" data-end="382">Funciona assim:</p>
<ul data-start="383" data-end="480">
<li data-start="383" data-end="402">
<p data-start="385" data-end="402">roda <strong data-start="390" data-end="402">24 horas</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="403" data-end="434">
<p data-start="405" data-end="434">não precisa mexer em servidor</p>
</li>
<li data-start="435" data-end="460">
<p data-start="437" data-end="460">não precisa saber Linux</p>
</li>
<li data-start="461" data-end="480">
<p data-start="463" data-end="480">só copiar e colar</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="482" data-end="485">
<h2 data-start="487" data-end="514">🔹 PASSO 1 — Criar conta</h2>
<p data-start="515" data-end="550">Entra aqui:<br>
👉 <a data-start="530" data-end="550" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="decorated-link" href="https://railway.app/">https://railway.app/<span aria-hidden="true" class="ms-0.5 inline-block align-middle leading-none"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" data-rtl-flip="" class="block h-[0.75em] w-[0.75em] stroke-current stroke-[0.75]"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#304883" fill="currentColor"></use></svg></span></a></p>
<p data-start="552" data-end="622">Clica em <strong data-start="561" data-end="582">Login with GitHub</strong><br data-start="582" data-end="585">
(se não tiver GitHub, cria rapidinho)</p>
<hr data-start="624" data-end="627">
<h2 data-start="629" data-end="658">🔹 PASSO 2 — Criar projeto</h2>
<ol data-start="659" data-end="763">

</li>
<li data-start="688" data-end="718">

</li>

</li>
</ol>

</li>
</ol>

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<ul data-start="1644" data-end="1760">

<p data-start="1736" data-end="1760">Muito mais fácil que VPS</p>

<hr data-start="1762" data-end="1765">
<h2 data-start="1767" data-end="1799">🧩 SE QUISER AINDA MAIS FÁCIL</h2>
<p data-start="1800" data-end="1818">Posso adaptar pra:</p>
<ul data-start="1819" data-end="1931">
<li data-start="1819" data-end="1839">
<p data-start="1821" data-end="1839">bot com <strong data-start="1829" data-end="1839">botões</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1840" data-end="1861">
<p data-start="1842" data-end="1861">mensagem mais limpa</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1862" data-end="1885">
<p data-start="1864" data-end="1885">alerta mais chamativo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1886" data-end="1902">
<p data-start="1888" data-end="1902">modo grupo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1903" data-end="1931">
<p data-start="1905" data-end="1931">só admins enviarem números</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1933" data-end="1986">Só responde:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="1949" data-end="1986">“quero deixar ainda mais simples”</strong></p>
<p data-start="1988" data-end="2005" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">tá ficando bom 👊</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 w-[calc(100%+--spacing(2.5))] duration-[1.5s] focus-within:transition-none hover:transition-none touch:pointer-events-auto pointer-events-none [mask-image:linear-gradient(to_right,black_33%,transparent_66%)] [mask-size:300%_100%] [mask-position:100%_0%] class="[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @w-lg/main:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[1px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full wrap-break-word light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="204">perfeito 👍 agora vamos 👉 <strong data-start="93" data-end="136">clicar com o mouse nos números (0 a 36)</strong><br data-start="136" data-end="139">
👉 sem digitar nada<br data-start="158" data-end="161">
👉 bot só conta e <strong data-start="179" data-end="204">avisa automaticamente</strong></p>
<p data-start="206" data-end="330">Abaixo está o <strong data-start="220" data-end="241">SCRIPT ATUALIZADO</strong>, já com <strong data-start="250" data-end="260">BOTÕES</strong>, já com <strong data-start="269" data-end="293">todas as suas regras</strong>, pronto pra colar no Railway ou VPS.</p>
<hr data-start="332" data-end="335">
<h2 data-start="337" data-end="396">🤖 BOT <strong data-start="347" data-end="363">$Criptoplay$</strong> — VERSÃO PROFISSIONAL COM BOTÕES</h2>
<h3 data-start="398" data-end="423">🎯 ESTRATÉGIAS ATIVAS</h3>
<p data-start="424" data-end="587">✅ Regra 1 – atraso 10 rodadas (Grupo 1)<br data-start="463" data-end="466">
✅ Regra 2 – atraso 10 rodadas (Grupo 2)<br data-start="505" data-end="508">
✅ Regra 3 – repetição controlada (Grupo 3)<br data-start="550" data-end="553">
✅ Entrada só por <strong data-start="570" data-end="580">clique</strong> (0–36)</p>
<hr data-start="589" data-end="592">
<h2 data-start="594" data-end="628">📌 SCRIPT COMPLETO (COPIA TUDO)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="630" data-end="3669"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># GRUPOS DE NÚMEROS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONTADORES</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

ultimas_5 = []
monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TECLADO 0–36</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado_roleta</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = [InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)]
    kb.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># START</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 **$Criptoplay$ ATIVO**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Clique no número que saiu na roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># RECEBER NÚMERO</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, ultimas_5, monitorando_rep, contador_4

    numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 1 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1:
        falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g1 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA 1** 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem números do **GRUPO 1**"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 2 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2:
        falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g2 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA 2** 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem números do **GRUPO 2**"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 3 --------</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(numero)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    qtd_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3])

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando_rep </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> qtd_rep &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando_rep:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA 3** 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Padrão de repetição confirmado (GRUPO 3)"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )
            monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># manter teclado sempre visível</span></span><span>
    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(
        call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        call.message.message_id,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta()
    )

    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3671" data-end="3674">
<h2 data-start="3676" data-end="3708">📂 SE FOR USAR NO <strong data-start="3697" data-end="3708">RAILWAY</strong></h2>
<p data-start="3709" data-end="3731">Crie também o arquivo:</p>
<h3 data-start="3733" data-end="3755"><code data-start="3737" data-end="3755">requirements.txt</code></h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3756" data-end="3780"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">pyTelegramBotAPI</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3782" data-end="3805">E no <strong data-start="3787" data-end="3804">Start Command</strong>:</p>

<hr data-start="3836" data-end="3839">
<h2 data-start="3841" data-end="3879">✅ COMO VOCÊ VAI USAR (NO DIA A DIA)</h2>
<p data-start="3880" data-end="4023">1️⃣ Abre o bot<br data-start="3894" data-end="3897">
2️⃣ Clica no número que saiu<br data-start="3925" data-end="3928">
3️⃣ Bot conta tudo<br data-start="3946" data-end="3949">
4️⃣ Se bater condição → <strong data-start="3973" data-end="3994">ALERTA AUTOMÁTICO</strong><br data-start="3994" data-end="3997">
5️⃣ Você decide a aposta</p>
<p data-start="4025" data-end="4058">Rápido, limpo, sem erro humano 💪</p>
<hr data-start="4060" data-end="4063">
<h2 data-start="4065" data-end="4104">🚀 PRÓXIMOS UPGRADES (quando quiser)</h2>
<ul data-start="4105" data-end="4246">
<li data-start="4105" data-end="4132">
<p data-start="4107" data-end="4132">👥 só admins podem clicar</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4133" data-end="4158">
<p data-start="4135" data-end="4158">📊 histórico por sessão</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4159" data-end="4193">
<p data-start="4161" data-end="4193">📢 enviar alertas para grupo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4194" data-end="4216">
<p data-start="4196" data-end="4216">🔐 senha / segurança</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4217" data-end="4246">
<p data-start="4219" data-end="4246">⏱️ marcar horário da rodada</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="4248" data-end="4317">Quando quiser evoluir, só falar:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="4284" data-end="4317">“vamos melhorar o Criptoplay”</strong></p>
<p data-start="4319" data-end="4365" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">ficou <strong data-start="4325" data-end="4362">nível casa de sinais profissional</strong> <hr data-start="301" data-end="304">
<h2 data-start="306" data-end="361">🤖 BOT <strong data-start="316" data-end="332">$Criptoplay$</strong> — VERSÃO FINAL (ADM + CANAL)</h2>
<h3 data-start="363" data-end="383">📌 COMO FUNCIONA</h3>
<ul data-start="384" data-end="577">
<li data-start="384" data-end="409">
<p data-start="386" data-end="409">O bot fica no <strong data-start="400" data-end="409">canal</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="410" data-end="471">
<p data-start="412" data-end="471"><strong data-start="412" data-end="442">Somente admins autorizados</strong> conseguem clicar nos números</p>
</li>
<li data-start="472" data-end="513">
<p data-start="474" data-end="513">Qualquer pessoa pode <strong data-start="495" data-end="513">ver os alertas</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="514" data-end="577">
<p data-start="516" data-end="577">Você clica → bot conta → se bater regra → <strong data-start="558" data-end="577">ALERTA NO CANAL</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="579" data-end="582">
<h2 data-start="584" data-end="624">🔑 PRIMEIRO: PEGAR SEU ID DO TELEGRAM</h2>
<ol data-start="625" data-end="675">
<li data-start="625" data-end="665">
<p data-start="628" data-end="665">No Telegram, procure <strong data-start="649" data-end="665">@userinfobot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="666" data-end="675">
<p data-start="669" data-end="675">Envie:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="676" data-end="690"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="3" data-start="691" data-end="754">
<li data-start="691" data-end="732">
<p data-start="694" data-end="732">Ele vai te mostrar seu <strong data-start="717" data-end="732">ID numérico</strong></p>
</li>
