<hr data-start="756" data-end="759">
<h2 data-start="761" data-end="792">📌 SCRIPT FINAL (COPIA TUDO)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="794" data-end="4207"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># IDS DOS ADMINS (COLOQUE OS SEUS)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># troque pelo seu ID</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># GRUPOS DE NÚMEROS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONTADORES</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

ultimas_5 = []
monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TECLADO 0–36</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado_roleta</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = [InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)]
    kb.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># START (USAR NO CANAL)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 **$Criptoplay$ — Painel de Operação**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Clique no número que saiu na roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># RECEBER CLIQUE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, ultimas_5, monitorando_rep, contador_4

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># BLOQUEIA NÃO-ADM</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⛔ Apenas admins podem registrar números."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 1 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1:
        falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g1 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA 1** 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem números do GRUPO 1"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 2 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2:
        falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g2 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA 2** 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem números do GRUPO 2"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 3 --------</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(numero)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    qtd_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3])

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando_rep </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> qtd_rep &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando_rep:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA 3** 🚨\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Padrão de repetição confirmado (GRUPO 3)"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )
            monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># mantém teclado ativo</span></span><span>
    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(
        call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        call.message.message_id,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta()
    )

    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando 24h..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="4209" data-end="4212">

<h2 data-start="391" data-end="424">🧭 PASSO A PASSO SUPER SIMPLES</h2>

<li data-start="526" data-end="534">
<p data-start="529" data-end="534">Nome:</p>

<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="535" data-end="555"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">powershell</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-variable">$Criptoplay</span></span><span><span class="hljs-variable">$</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="4" data-start="556" data-end="568">
<li data-start="556" data-end="568">
<p data-start="559" data-end="568">Username:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="569" data-end="591"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">Criptoplay_bot</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="5" data-start="592" data-end="629">
<li data-start="592" data-end="629">
<p data-start="595" data-end="629">Copie a <strong data-start="603" data-end="616">API TOKEN</strong> (guarda ela)</p>

<h2 data-start="1912" data-end="1946">📌 ÚLTIMOS DETALHES IMPORTANTES</h2>
<p data-start="1947" data-end="2099">1️⃣ Adicione o <strong data-start="1962" data-end="1989">bot como ADMIN do canal</strong><br data-start="1989" data-end="1992">
2️⃣ No script, confirme que seu <strong data-start="2024" data-end="2046">ID está nos ADMINS</strong><br data-start="2046" data-end="2049">
3️⃣ Use <code data-start="2057" data-end="2065">/start</code> no canal pra aparecer os botões</p>
<hr data-start="2101" data-end="2104">
<h2 data-start="2106" data-end="2132">🧠 SE DER QUALQUER ERRO</h2>

<p data-start="2199" data-end="2222">que eu te guio na hora.</p>

data-turn-id="cdb2affa-4058-4831-9489-e7bbd72d7252" data-testid="conversation-turn-47" data-scroll-anchor="false" data-turn="user"><h5 class="sr-only">Você disse:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto class="[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @w-lg/main:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex class="whitespace-pre-wrap">from telebot.types import InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButtonAPI_TOKEN = "8502821738:AAFMPDzVKl9B1KIPvp5dX9jhRBIScy_SQv0"bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)# =========================# IDS DOS ADMINS (COLOQUE OS SEUS)# =========================ADMINS = {123456789}  # troque pelo seu ID# =========================# GRUPOS DE NÚMEROS# =========================grupo1 = {3,6,9,13,16,19,23,26,29,33,36}grupo2 = {19,15,32,0,26,3,35,12,28,8,23,10,5}grupo3 = {27,17,25,5}# =========================# CONTADORES# =========================falha_g1 = 0falha_g2 = 0ultimas_5 = []monitorando_rep = Falsecontador_4 = 0# =========================# TECLADO 0–36# =========================def teclado_roleta():    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=6)    botoes = [InlineKeyboardButton(str(i), callback_data=str(i)) for i in range(37)]    kb.add(*botoes)    return kb# =========================# START (USAR NO CANAL)# =========================@bot.message_handler(commands=['start'])def start(msg):    if msg.from_user.id not in ADMINS:        return    bot.send_message(        msg.chat.id,        "🎰 **$Criptoplay$ — Painel de Operação**\n\n"        "Clique no número que saiu na roleta:",        reply_markup=teclado_roleta(),        parse_mode="Markdown"    )# =========================# RECEBER CLIQUE# =========================@bot.callback_query_handler(func=lambda call: True)def receber(call):    global falha_g1, falha_g2, ultimas_5, monitorando_rep, contador_4    # BLOQUEIA NÃO-ADM    if call.from_user.id not in ADMINS:        bot.answer_callback_query(call.id, "⛔ Apenas admins podem registrar números.")        return    numero = int(call.data)    # -------- REGRA 1 --------    if numero in grupo1:        falha_g1 = 0    else:        falha_g1 += 1        if falha_g1 == 10:            bot.send_message(                call.message.chat.id,                "🚨 **ALERTA 1** 🚨\n"                "10 rodadas sem números do GRUPO 1",                parse_mode="Markdown"            )    # -------- REGRA 2 --------    if numero in grupo2:        falha_g2 = 0    else:        falha_g2 += 1        if falha_g2 == 10:            bot.send_message(                call.message.chat.id,                "🚨 **ALERTA 2** 🚨\n"                "10 rodadas sem números do GRUPO 2",                parse_mode="Markdown"            )    # -------- REGRA 3 --------    ultimas_5.append(numero)    if len(ultimas_5) &gt; 5:        ultimas_5.pop(0)    qtd_rep = len([n for n in ultimas_5 if n in grupo3])    if not monitorando_rep and qtd_rep &gt;= 2:        monitorando_rep = True        contador_4 = 0    if monitorando_rep:        contador_4 += 1        if numero in grupo3:            bot.send_message(                call.message.chat.id,                "🚨 **ALERTA 3** 🚨\n"                "Padrão de repetição confirmado (GRUPO 3)",                parse_mode="Markdown"            )            monitorando_rep = False            contador_4 = 0        if contador_4 &gt;= 4:            monitorando_rep = False            contador_4 = 0    # mantém teclado ativo    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(        call.message.chat.id,        call.message.message_id,        reply_markup=teclado_roleta()    )    bot.answer_callback_query(call.id)print("🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando 24h...")bot.infinity_polling()
0 comentários de commitComentários0&nbsp;(0)Conversa com fechaduras chat corrija isso tudo ta erradoo scripto resto estrategia as coisata ceerto estou fazebdo pelo railway manda pronto ja</div></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex justify-end"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none focus-within:transition-none class="[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @w-lg/main:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex <h2 data-start="256" data-end="302">✅ SCRIPT FINAL – PRONTO PRA USAR NO RAILWAY</h2>
<p data-start="304" data-end="335">👉 <strong data-start="307" data-end="319">arquivo:</strong> <code data-start="320" data-end="335">criptoplay.py</code></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="337" data-end="3953"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TOKEN DO BOT</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SUA_API_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># IDS DOS ADMINS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># troque pelo SEU ID do Telegram</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># GRUPOS DE NÚMEROS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONTADORES</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
ultimas_5 = []
monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TECLADO 0–36</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado_roleta</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = [
        InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i))
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)
    ]
    kb.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># START (USAR NO CANAL)</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">"start"</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 *$Criptoplay$ — Painel de Operação*\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Clique no número que saiu na roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># RECEBER CLIQUE DOS BOTÕES</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, ultimas_5, monitorando_rep, contador_4

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># BLOQUEIA NÃO-ADM</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        bot.answer_callback_query(
            call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
            </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⛔ Apenas admins podem clicar."</span></span><span>
        )
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 1 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1:
        falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g1 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 *ALERTA 1*\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem números do GRUPO 1"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 2 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2:
        falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g2 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 *ALERTA 2*\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"10 rodadas sem números do GRUPO 2"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REGRA 3 --------</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(numero)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    qtd_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3])

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando_rep </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> qtd_rep &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando_rep:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> numero </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(
                call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 *ALERTA 3*\n"</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Padrão de repetição confirmado (GRUPO 3)"</span></span><span>,
                parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
            )
            monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando_rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
            contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># MANTÉM O TECLADO ATIVO</span></span><span>
    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(
        call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        call.message.message_id,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta()
    )

    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># INICIAR BOT</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando 24h..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<hr data-start="4012" data-end="4015">
<h2 data-start="4017" data-end="4054">🚀 COMO RODAR NO RAILWAY (RESUMÃO)</h2>
<p data-start="4055" data-end="4184">1️⃣ GitHub → subir <code data-start="4074" data-end="4089">criptoplay.py</code> e <code data-start="4092" data-end="4110">requirements.txt</code><br data-start="4110" data-end="4113">
2️⃣ Railway → <strong data-start="4127" data-end="4163">New Project → Deploy from GitHub</strong><br data-start="4163" data-end="4166">
3️⃣ Start Command:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="4185" data-end="4213"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">python</span></span><span> criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="4214" data-end="4278">4️⃣ Adicione o bot como <strong data-start="4238" data-end="4256">ADMIN do canal</strong><br>
5️⃣ No canal, digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="4279" data-end="4293"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="4295" data-end="4298">
<h2 data-start="4300" data-end="4323">✅ O QUE ESSE BOT FAZ</h2>
<p data-start="4324" data-end="4471">✔ Só <strong data-start="4329" data-end="4342">ADM clica</strong> (sem senha)<br data-start="4354" data-end="4357">
✔ Botões <strong data-start="4366" data-end="4396">0 a 36 clicáveis com mouse</strong><br data-start="4396" data-end="4399">
✔ Estratégia mantida<br data-start="4419" data-end="4422">
✔ Alertas automáticos<br data-start="4443" data-end="4446">
✔ Roda <strong data-start="4453" data-end="4471">24h no Railway</strong></p>
<hr data-start="4473" data-end="4476">

</li>

<p data-start="4619" data-end="4640">🔁 reset automático</p>
</li>
</ul>

<p data-start="465" data-end="513">Ele vai te mostrar um número → <strong data-start="496" data-end="513">esse é seu ID</strong></p>

</li>

<h2 data-start="1467" data-end="1494">5️⃣ CONFIGURAR PRA RODAR</h2>
<h3 data-start="1496" data-end="1516">🚀 Start Command</h3>
<p data-start="1517" data-end="1571">No Railway, vá em <strong data-start="1535" data-end="1563">Settings → Start Command</strong><br data-start="1563" data-end="1566">
Cole:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1572" data-end="1600"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">python</span></span><span> criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="1602" data-end="1634">📦 Ele vai instalar sozinho:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1635" data-end="1659"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">pyTelegramBotAPI</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1661" data-end="1677">Quando aparecer:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1678" data-end="1716"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">powershell</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>🤖 </span><span><span class="hljs-variable">$Criptoplay</span></span><span><span class="hljs-variable">$</span></span><span> rodando </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">h</span></span><span>...
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1717" data-end="1741">👉 <strong data-start="1720" data-end="1741">BOT JÁ ESTÁ NO AR</strong></p>
<hr data-start="1743" data-end="1746">
<h2 data-start="1748" data-end="1785">6️⃣ CONFIGURAR O CANAL NO TELEGRAM</h2>
<ol data-start="1787" data-end="1929">
<li data-start="1787" data-end="1807">
<p data-start="1790" data-end="1807">Crie um <strong data-start="1798" data-end="1807">CANAL</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1808" data-end="1836">
<p data-start="1811" data-end="1836">Adicione seu bot no canal</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1837" data-end="1865">
<p data-start="1840" data-end="1865">Vá em <strong data-start="1846" data-end="1865">Administradores</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1866" data-end="1929">
<p data-start="1869" data-end="1896">Marque o bot como <strong data-start="1887" data-end="1896">ADMIN</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1900" data-end="1929">
<li data-start="1900" data-end="1929">
<p data-start="1902" data-end="1929">Permissão: enviar mensagens</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1931" data-end="1934">
<h2 data-start="1936" data-end="1959">7️⃣ INICIAR O PAINEL</h2>
<p data-start="1961" data-end="1982">No <strong data-start="1964" data-end="1973">CANAL</strong>, digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1983" data-end="1997"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1999" data-end="2072">Vai aparecer:<br>
🎰 $Criptoplay$ — Painel de Operação<br data-start="2049" data-end="2052">
👉 botões <strong data-start="2062" data-end="2072">0 a 36</strong></p>
<p data-start="2074" data-end="2152">Agora é só:<br>
✔ clicar nos números<br data-start="2106" data-end="2109">
✔ receber alertas automáticos<br data-start="2138" data-end="2141">
✔ rodar 24h</p>
<hr data-start="2154" data-end="2157">
<h2 data-start="2159" data-end="2190">🔥 ERROS COMUNS (EVITA ISSO)</h2>
<p data-start="2191" data-end="2320">❌ esquecer de trocar o TOKEN<br data-start="2219" data-end="2222">
❌ não colocar o bot como admin<br data-start="2252" data-end="2255">
❌ start command errado<br data-start="2277" data-end="2280">
❌ usar grupo em vez de canal (use CANAL)</p>
<hr data-start="2322" data-end="2325">
<h2 data-start="2327" data-end="2343">🧠 DICA FINAL</h2>
<p data-start="2344" data-end="2428">👉 Você <strong data-start="2352" data-end="2394">não precisa mexer em código nunca mais</strong><br data-start="2394" data-end="2397">
Só clicar nos números e operar.</p>
<p data-start="2430" data-end="2467">Se quiser, no próximo passo eu posso:</p>
<ul data-start="2468" data-end="2570">
<li data-start="2468" data-end="2494">
<p data-start="2470" data-end="2494">🔔 colocar alerta sonoro</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2495" data-end="2517">
<p data-start="2497" data-end="2517">📊 histórico por dia</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2518" data-end="2539">
<p data-start="2520" data-end="2539">🔄 reset automático</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2540" data-end="2570">
<p data-start="2542" data-end="2570">💰 gestão de banca integrada</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2572" data-end="2595" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">fala que eu continuo 👊</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div <hr data-start="133" data-end="136">
<h1 data-start="138" data-end="197">🟢 COMO COLOCAR O BOT NO AR (JEITO MAIS SIMPLES POSSÍVEL)</h1>
<h2 data-start="199" data-end="222">👉 O QUE VOCÊ JÁ TEM</h2>
<ul data-start="223" data-end="280">
<li data-start="223" data-end="237">
<p data-start="225" data-end="237">✔ Telegram</p>
</li>
<li data-start="238" data-end="267">
<p data-start="240" data-end="267">✔ Bot criado no BotFather</p>
</li>
<li data-start="268" data-end="280">
<p data-start="270" data-end="280">✔ GitHub</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-start="282" data-end="299">👉 O QUE FALTA</h2>
<ul data-start="300" data-end="352">
<li data-start="300" data-end="352">
<p data-start="302" data-end="352">❗ <strong data-start="304" data-end="315">Railway</strong> (é só logar, não precisa saber nada)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="354" data-end="357">
<h2 data-start="359" data-end="398">PASSO 1 — PEGAR SEU ID (OBRIGATÓRIO)</h2>
<p data-start="399" data-end="411">No Telegram:</p>
<ol data-start="412" data-end="511">
<li data-start="412" data-end="439">
<p data-start="415" data-end="439">Procure <strong data-start="423" data-end="439">@userinfobot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="440" data-end="478">
<p data-start="443" data-end="478">Ele vai responder com um <strong data-start="468" data-end="478">número</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="479" data-end="511">
<p data-start="482" data-end="511">Guarde esse número (é seu ID)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="513" data-end="516">
<h2 data-start="518" data-end="563">PASSO 2 — ARRUMAR O SCRIPT (UMA ÚNICA VEZ)</h2>
<p data-start="564" data-end="591">No arquivo <code data-start="575" data-end="590">criptoplay.py</code>:</p>
<p data-start="593" data-end="627">1️⃣ onde tem o token, deixe assim:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="628" data-end="672"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ini</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attr">API_TOKEN</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"SEU_TOKEN_DO_BOTFATHER"</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="674" data-end="714">2️⃣ onde tem ADMINS, coloque <strong data-start="703" data-end="713">seu ID</strong>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="715" data-end="740"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">ini</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attr">ADMINS</span></span><span> = {SEU_ID}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="742" data-end="767">👉 <strong data-start="745" data-end="767">não muda mais nada</strong></p>
<hr data-start="769" data-end="772">
<h2 data-start="774" data-end="803">PASSO 3 — SUBIR PRO GITHUB</h2>
<p data-start="804" data-end="814">No GitHub:</p>
<ol data-start="816" data-end="964">
<li data-start="816" data-end="847">
<p data-start="819" data-end="847">Clique em <strong data-start="829" data-end="847">New repository</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="848" data-end="873">
<p data-start="851" data-end="873">Nome: <code data-start="857" data-end="873">criptoplay-bot</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="874" data-end="894">
<p data-start="877" data-end="894">Create repository</p>
</li>
<li data-start="895" data-end="964">
<p data-start="898" data-end="919">Envie <strong data-start="904" data-end="918">2 arquivos</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="923" data-end="964">
<li data-start="923" data-end="940">
<p data-start="925" data-end="940"><code data-start="925" data-end="940">criptoplay.py</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="944" data-end="964">
<p data-start="946" data-end="964"><code data-start="946" data-end="964">requirements.txt</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="966" data-end="1000">No <code data-start="969" data-end="987">requirements.txt</code> tem só isso:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1001" data-end="1025"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">pyTelegramBotAPI</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1027" data-end="1050">Pronto. Fecha o GitHub.</p>
<hr data-start="1052" data-end="1055">
<h2 data-start="1057" data-end="1087">PASSO 4 — ENTRAR NO RAILWAY</h2>
<ol data-start="1088" data-end="1171">
<li data-start="1088" data-end="1115">
<p data-start="1091" data-end="1115">Entre em <strong data-start="1100" data-end="1115">railway.app</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1116" data-end="1138">
<p data-start="1119" data-end="1138">Clique em <strong data-start="1129" data-end="1138">Login</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1139" data-end="1171">
<p data-start="1142" data-end="1171">Escolha <strong data-start="1150" data-end="1171">Login with GitHub</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1173" data-end="1181">Só isso.</p>
<hr data-start="1183" data-end="1186">
<h2 data-start="1188" data-end="1225">PASSO 5 — LIGAR O BOT (AUTOMÁTICO)</h2>
<p data-start="1226" data-end="1237">No Railway:</p>
<ol data-start="1239" data-end="1331">
<li data-start="1239" data-end="1267">
<p data-start="1242" data-end="1267">Clique em <strong data-start="1252" data-end="1267">New Project</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1268" data-end="1303">
<p data-start="1271" data-end="1303">Clique em <strong data-start="1281" data-end="1303">Deploy from GitHub</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1304" data-end="1331">
<p data-start="1307" data-end="1331">Escolha <code data-start="1315" data-end="1331">criptoplay-bot</code></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1333" data-end="1350">Aguarde 1 minuto.</p>
<hr data-start="1352" data-end="1355">
<h2 data-start="1357" data-end="1391">PASSO 6 — DIZER COMO ELE INICIA</h2>
<p data-start="1392" data-end="1409">Ainda no Railway:</p>
<ol data-start="1411" data-end="1466">
<li data-start="1411" data-end="1432">
<p data-start="1414" data-end="1432">Vá em <strong data-start="1420" data-end="1432">Settings</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1433" data-end="1466">
<p data-start="1436" data-end="1466">Em <strong data-start="1439" data-end="1456">Start Command</strong>, escreva:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1467" data-end="1495"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">python</span></span><span> criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="3" data-start="1496" data-end="1519">
<li data-start="1496" data-end="1519">
<p data-start="1499" data-end="1519">Clique em <strong data-start="1509" data-end="1519">Deploy</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1521" data-end="1558">👉 acabou. O bot já está rodando 24h.</p>
<hr data-start="1560" data-end="1563">
<h2 data-start="1565" data-end="1594">PASSO 7 — USAR NO TELEGRAM</h2>
<ol data-start="1595" data-end="1696">
<li data-start="1595" data-end="1615">
<p data-start="1598" data-end="1615">Crie um <strong data-start="1606" data-end="1615">CANAL</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1616" data-end="1642">
<p data-start="1619" data-end="1642">Adicione o bot no canal</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1643" data-end="1674">
<p data-start="1646" data-end="1674">Coloque o bot como <strong data-start="1665" data-end="1674">ADMIN</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1675" data-end="1696">
<p data-start="1678" data-end="1696">No canal, escreva:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1697" data-end="1711"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1713" data-end="1813">Vai aparecer os botões <strong data-start="1736" data-end="1748">0 até 36</strong><br data-start="1748" data-end="1751">
Você só <strong data-start="1759" data-end="1780">clica nos números</strong><br data-start="1780" data-end="1783">
O bot faz as contas e avisa 🔔</p>
<hr data-start="1815" data-end="1818">
<h2 data-start="1820" data-end="1845">🧠 RESUMO EM UMA LINHA</h2>
<p data-start="1846" data-end="1908">GitHub (arquivos) → Railway (liga) → Telegram (clicar números)</p>
<hr data-start="1910" data-end="1913">
<p data-start="1915" data-end="1979">Se quiser, me diga agora:<br>
👉 <strong data-start="1944" data-end="1971">em qual passo você está</strong> (1 a 7)</p>

<hr data-start="81" data-end="84">
<h1 data-start="86" data-end="121">✅ COMO FAZER O <code data-start="103" data-end="121">requirements.txt</code></h1>
<h2 data-start="123" data-end="156">OPÇÃO MAIS FÁCIL (PELO GITHUB)</h2>
<h3 data-start="158" data-end="202">1️⃣ Entre no seu repositório no GitHub</h3>
<p data-start="203" data-end="235">(onde já está o <code data-start="219" data-end="234">criptoplay.py</code>)</p>
<h3 data-start="237" data-end="267">2️⃣ Clique em <strong data-start="255" data-end="267">Add file</strong></h3>
<p data-start="268" data-end="297">👉 depois <strong data-start="278" data-end="297">Create new file</strong></p>
<h3 data-start="299" data-end="350">3️⃣ No nome do arquivo, escreva <strong data-start="335" data-end="349">EXATAMENTE</strong>:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="351" data-end="375"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>requirements.txt
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="376" data-end="404">⚠️ tudo minúsculo, com ponto</p>
<h3 data-start="406" data-end="458">4️⃣ No conteúdo do arquivo, escreva <strong data-start="446" data-end="457">só isso</strong>:</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="459" data-end="483"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">pyTelegramBotAPI</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="485" data-end="522">5️⃣ Clique em <strong data-start="503" data-end="522">Commit new file</strong></h3>
<p data-start="524" data-end="561">👉 pronto, acabou. Não tem mais nada.</p>
<hr data-start="563" data-end="566">
<h2 data-start="568" data-end="597">🔎 COMO SABER SE DEU CERTO</h2>
<p data-start="598" data-end="653">No seu repositório agora devem aparecer <strong data-start="638" data-end="652">2 arquivos</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="654" data-end="692">
<li data-start="654" data-end="671">
<p data-start="656" data-end="671"><code data-start="656" data-end="671">criptoplay.py</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="672" data-end="692">
<p data-start="674" data-end="692"><code data-start="674" data-end="692">requirements.txt</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="694" data-end="725">Se aparecer assim, está certo ✅</p>
<hr data-start="727" data-end="730">
<h2 data-start="732" data-end="760">❌ ERROS COMUNS (NÃO FAÇA)</h2>
<ul data-start="761" data-end="867">
<li data-start="761" data-end="783">
<p data-start="763" data-end="783">❌ <code data-start="765" data-end="783">requirements.TXT</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="784" data-end="805">
<p data-start="786" data-end="805">❌ <code data-start="788" data-end="805">requirement.txt</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="806" data-end="832">
<p data-start="808" data-end="832">❌ <code data-start="810" data-end="832">requirements.txt.txt</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="833" data-end="867">
<p data-start="835" data-end="867">❌ colocar outras palavras dentro</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="869" data-end="872">
<h2 data-start="874" data-end="893">👉 PRÓXIMO PASSO</h2>
<p data-start="894" data-end="924">Agora vá para o <strong data-start="910" data-end="921">Railway</strong> e:</p>
<ul data-start="925" data-end="991">
<li data-start="925" data-end="942">
<p data-start="927" data-end="942"><strong data-start="927" data-end="942">New Project</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="943" data-end="967">
<p data-start="945" data-end="967"><strong data-start="945" data-end="967">Deploy from GitHub</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="968" data-end="991">
<p data-start="970" data-end="991">escolha o repositório</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="993" data-end="1012">Se quiser, me diga:</p>
<blockquote data-start="1013" data-end="1040">
<p data-start="1015" data-end="1040">“já criei o requirements”</p>
</blockquote>
<p data-start="1042" data-end="1085" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">que eu te guio no próximo passo certinho 👍</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 w-[calc(100%+--spacing(2.5))] <hr data-start="94" data-end="97">
<h1 data-start="99" data-end="139">🟢 COMO ACHAR O <strong data-start="117" data-end="129">ADD FILE</strong> NO GITHUB</h1>
<h2 data-start="141" data-end="168">1️⃣ ENTRE NO REPOSITÓRIO</h2>
<p data-start="169" data-end="179">No GitHub:</p>
<ul data-start="180" data-end="242">
<li data-start="180" data-end="242">
<p data-start="182" data-end="242">clique no <strong data-start="192" data-end="219">nome do seu repositório</strong><br>
(ex: <code data-start="225" data-end="241">criptoplay-bot</code>)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="244" data-end="326">👉 você tem que estar vendo a <strong data-start="274" data-end="295">lista de arquivos</strong> (onde aparece <code data-start="310" data-end="325">criptoplay.py</code>)</p>
<hr data-start="328" data-end="331">
<h2 data-start="333" data-end="363">2️⃣ OLHE PARA CIMA DA LISTA</h2>
<p data-start="364" data-end="446">Logo <strong data-start="369" data-end="391">acima dos arquivos</strong>, do lado direito, você vai ver um botão verde escrito:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="448" data-end="465"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">css</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>&lt;&gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">Code</span></span><span> ▾
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="467" data-end="511">👉 <strong data-start="470" data-end="488">à direita dele</strong>, tem um botão escrito:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="513" data-end="531"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">csharp</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>Add </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">file</span></span><span> ▾
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="533" data-end="609">⚠️ ele <strong data-start="540" data-end="576">só aparece dentro do repositório</strong>, não na página inicial do GitHub</p>
<hr data-start="611" data-end="614">
<h2 data-start="616" data-end="645">3️⃣ CLIQUE EM <strong data-start="633" data-end="645">Add file</strong></h2>
<p data-start="646" data-end="680">Vai abrir um menu com duas opções:</p>
<ul data-start="682" data-end="736">
<li data-start="682" data-end="719">
<p data-start="684" data-end="719"><strong data-start="684" data-end="703">Create new file</strong> ← clique aqui</p>
</li>
<li data-start="720" data-end="736">
<p data-start="722" data-end="736">Upload files</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="738" data-end="741">
<h2 data-start="743" data-end="776">4️⃣ CRIAR O <code data-start="758" data-end="776">requirements.txt</code></h2>
<p data-start="777" data-end="817">Depois de clicar em <strong data-start="797" data-end="816">Create new file</strong>:</p>
<h3 data-start="819" data-end="858">📌 Nome do arquivo (campo de cima):</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="859" data-end="883"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>requirements.txt
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<h3 data-start="885" data-end="916">📌 Conteúdo (campo grande):</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="917" data-end="941"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">pyTelegramBotAPI</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="943" data-end="946">
<h2 data-start="948" data-end="961">5️⃣ SALVAR</h2>
<p data-start="962" data-end="989">Desça a página e clique em:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="990" data-end="1013"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">csharp</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>Commit </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">new</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">file</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1015" data-end="1033">👉 pronto, acabou.</p>
<hr data-start="1035" data-end="1038">
<h2 data-start="1040" data-end="1067">🧠 SE AINDA NÃO APARECER</h2>
<p data-start="1068" data-end="1079">Tenta isso:</p>
<ol data-start="1080" data-end="1215">
<li data-start="1080" data-end="1108">
<p data-start="1083" data-end="1108">aperta <strong data-start="1090" data-end="1096">F5</strong> (atualizar)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1109" data-end="1152">
<p data-start="1112" data-end="1152">volta para a aba <strong data-start="1129" data-end="1137">Code</strong> do repositório</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1153" data-end="1215">
<p data-start="1156" data-end="1215">confere se você não está em <strong data-start="1184" data-end="1215">Issues / Actions / Settings</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1217" data-end="1243">Tem que estar em <strong data-start="1234" data-end="1242">Code</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1245" data-end="1248">
<h2 data-start="1250" data-end="1268">👉 ME DIZ AGORA</h2>

<ul data-start="1308" data-end="1368">
<li data-start="1308" data-end="1336">
<p data-start="1310" data-end="1336">aparece <code data-start="1318" data-end="1333">criptoplay.py</code>?</p>
