<hr data-start="112" data-end="115">
<h1 data-start="117" data-end="158">❌ POR QUE O <code data-start="131" data-end="149">requirements.txt</code> DEU ERRO</h1>
<p data-start="159" data-end="197">Normalmente é <strong data-start="173" data-end="196">um desses 3 motivos</strong>:</p>
<h3 data-start="199" data-end="233">🔴 1) nome do arquivo errado</h3>
<h3 data-start="234" data-end="261">🔴 2) conteúdo errado</h3>
<h3 data-start="262" data-end="295">🔴 3) Railway não leu direito</h3>
<p data-start="297" data-end="339">Vamos conferir <strong data-start="312" data-end="325">um por um</strong>, bem simples.</p>
<hr data-start="341" data-end="344">
<h2 data-start="346" data-end="387">✅ PASSO 1 — CONFIRME O NOME DO ARQUIVO</h2>
<p data-start="388" data-end="460">No GitHub, no seu repositório, veja se o nome está <strong data-start="439" data-end="453">EXATAMENTE</strong> assim:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="462" data-end="486"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>requirements.txt
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="488" data-end="503">⚠️ tem que ser:</p>
<ul data-start="504" data-end="564">
<li data-start="504" data-end="520">
<p data-start="506" data-end="520">tudo minúsculo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="521" data-end="534">
<p data-start="523" data-end="534">só um ponto</p>
</li>
<li data-start="535" data-end="547">
<p data-start="537" data-end="547">sem espaço</p>
</li>
<li data-start="548" data-end="564">
<p data-start="550" data-end="564">sem <code data-start="554" data-end="564">.txt.txt</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="566" data-end="575">❌ errado:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="576" data-end="638"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>Requirements.txt
requirements.TXT
requirements.txt.txt
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="640" data-end="658">Se estiver errado:</p>
<ul data-start="659" data-end="724">
<li data-start="659" data-end="678">
<p data-start="661" data-end="678">clique no arquivo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="679" data-end="698">
<p data-start="681" data-end="698">botão do lápis ✏️</p>
</li>
<li data-start="699" data-end="715">
<p data-start="701" data-end="715">corrija o nome</p>
</li>
<li data-start="716" data-end="724">
<p data-start="718" data-end="724">commit</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="726" data-end="729">
<h2 data-start="731" data-end="765">✅ PASSO 2 — CONFIRME O CONTEÚDO</h2>
<p data-start="766" data-end="822">Abra o <code data-start="773" data-end="791">requirements.txt</code> e veja se tem <strong data-start="806" data-end="816">APENAS</strong> isso:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="824" data-end="848"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">pyTelegramBotAPI</span></span><span>

<p data-start="882" data-end="904">espaço antes ou depois</p>
</li>

<hr data-start="217" data-end="220">
<h1 data-start="222" data-end="267">✅ COMO CORRIGIR “NENHUM COMANDO ENCONTRADO”</h1>
<h2 data-start="269" data-end="305">PASSO 1 — ENTRAR NO PROJETO CERTO</h2>
<p data-start="306" data-end="317">No Railway:</p>
<ol data-start="318" data-end="430">
<li data-start="318" data-end="354">
<p data-start="321" data-end="354">Clique no <strong data-start="331" data-end="354">nome do seu projeto</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="355" data-end="430">
<p data-start="358" data-end="430">Clique no <strong data-start="368" data-end="379">serviço</strong> (normalmente aparece um quadrado com nome do repo)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="432" data-end="495">⚠️ você precisa estar <strong data-start="454" data-end="475">dentro do serviço</strong>, não na tela geral.</p>
<hr data-start="497" data-end="500">
<h2 data-start="502" data-end="538">PASSO 2 — COLOCAR O START COMMAND</h2>
<p data-start="539" data-end="545">Agora:</p>
<ol data-start="547" data-end="647">
<li data-start="547" data-end="572">
<p data-start="550" data-end="572">Clique em <strong data-start="560" data-end="572">Settings</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="573" data-end="618">
<p data-start="576" data-end="618">Procure um campo chamado <strong data-start="601" data-end="618">Start Command</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="619" data-end="647">
<p data-start="622" data-end="647">Cole <strong data-start="627" data-end="641">EXATAMENTE</strong> isso:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="648" data-end="676"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">python</span></span><span> criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="4" data-start="677" data-end="736">
<li data-start="677" data-end="696">
<p data-start="680" data-end="696">Aperte <strong data-start="687" data-end="696">Enter</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="697" data-end="736">
<p data-start="700" data-end="736">Clique em <strong data-start="710" data-end="720">Deploy</strong> ou <strong data-start="724" data-end="736">Redeploy</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="738" data-end="741">
<h2 data-start="743" data-end="773">PASSO 3 — CONFERIR NOS LOGS</h2>
<p data-start="774" data-end="788">Vá em <strong data-start="780" data-end="788">Logs</strong></p>
<p data-start="790" data-end="820">Se aparecer algo parecido com:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="821" data-end="859"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">powershell</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>🤖 </span><span><span class="hljs-variable">$Criptoplay</span></span><span><span class="hljs-variable">$</span></span><span> rodando </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">h</span></span><span>...
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="860" data-end="887">ou não aparecer erro nenhum</p>
<p data-start="889" data-end="932">👉 <strong data-start="892" data-end="905">DEU CERTO</strong> ✅<br data-start="907" data-end="910">
o bot já está rodando.</p>
<hr data-start="934" data-end="937">
<h2 data-start="939" data-end="961">❌ SE AINDA DER ERRO</h2>
<p data-start="962" data-end="1009">Confirma pra mim só isso (responde SIM ou NÃO):</p>
<p data-start="1011" data-end="1127">1️⃣ o arquivo se chama <strong data-start="1034" data-end="1051">criptoplay.py</strong><br data-start="1051" data-end="1054">
2️⃣ o Start Command está <strong data-start="1079" data-end="1093">igualzinho</strong><br data-start="1093" data-end="1096">
3️⃣ o requirements.txt existe</p>

3 sim
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<hr data-start="165" data-end="168">
<h1 data-start="170" data-end="206">✅ AGORA O QUE FAZER (ÚLTIMA PARTE)</h1>
<h2 data-start="208" data-end="236">PASSO 1 — IR PRO TELEGRAM</h2>
<ol data-start="237" data-end="300">
<li data-start="237" data-end="259">
<p data-start="240" data-end="259">Abra o <strong data-start="247" data-end="259">Telegram</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="260" data-end="300">
<p data-start="263" data-end="300">Procure pelo seu bot <strong data-start="284" data-end="300">$Criptoplay$</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="302" data-end="305">
<h2 data-start="307" data-end="334">PASSO 2 — CRIAR UM CANAL</h2>
<ol data-start="335" data-end="448">
<li data-start="335" data-end="369">
<p data-start="338" data-end="369">Crie um <strong data-start="346" data-end="355">CANAL</strong> (não é grupo)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="370" data-end="405">
<p data-start="373" data-end="405">Nome do canal: o que você quiser</p>
</li>
<li data-start="406" data-end="448">
<p data-start="409" data-end="448">Canal <strong data-start="415" data-end="437">privado ou público</strong>, tanto faz</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="450" data-end="453">
<h2 data-start="455" data-end="492">PASSO 3 — ADICIONAR O BOT NO CANAL</h2>
<ol data-start="493" data-end="665">
<li data-start="493" data-end="531">
<p data-start="496" data-end="531">Entre em <strong data-start="505" data-end="531">Configurações do canal</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="532" data-end="554">
<p data-start="535" data-end="554"><strong data-start="535" data-end="554">Administradores</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="555" data-end="585">
<p data-start="558" data-end="585"><strong data-start="558" data-end="585">Adicionar administrador</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="586" data-end="615">
<p data-start="589" data-end="615">Escolha o <strong data-start="599" data-end="615">$Criptoplay$</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="616" data-end="655">
<p data-start="619" data-end="626">Marque:</p>
<ul data-start="630" data-end="655">
<li data-start="630" data-end="655">
<p data-start="632" data-end="655">✅ Pode enviar mensagens</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="656" data-end="665">
<p data-start="659" data-end="665">Salvar</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="667" data-end="688">⚠️ isso é obrigatório</p>
<hr data-start="690" data-end="693">
<h2 data-start="695" data-end="724">PASSO 4 — INICIAR O PAINEL</h2>
<p data-start="725" data-end="753">Dentro do <strong data-start="735" data-end="744">CANAL</strong>, digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="754" data-end="768"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="770" data-end="786">👉 vai aparecer:</p>
<ul data-start="787" data-end="826">
<li data-start="787" data-end="804">
<p data-start="789" data-end="804">mensagem do bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="805" data-end="826">
<p data-start="807" data-end="826">botões <strong data-start="814" data-end="826">0 até 36</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="828" data-end="831">
<h2 data-start="833" data-end="863">PASSO 5 — USAR NO DIA A DIA</h2>
<p data-start="864" data-end="875">Agora é só:</p>
<ul data-start="876" data-end="989">
<li data-start="876" data-end="913">
<p data-start="878" data-end="913">clicar no número que saiu na roleta</p>
</li>
<li data-start="914" data-end="940">
<p data-start="916" data-end="940">o bot conta tudo sozinho</p>
</li>
<li data-start="941" data-end="989">
<p data-start="943" data-end="989">quando bater as regras → <strong data-start="968" data-end="989">alerta automático</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="991" data-end="1055">Ele roda:<br>
✔ 24 horas<br data-start="1011" data-end="1014">
✔ sem travar<br data-start="1026" data-end="1029">
✔ mesmo com PC desligado</p>
<hr data-start="1057" data-end="1060">
<h2 data-start="1062" data-end="1093">🔔 SE NÃO APARECER OS BOTÕES</h2>
<p data-start="1094" data-end="1109">Faz esse teste:</p>
<ol data-start="1110" data-end="1187">
<li data-start="1110" data-end="1149">
<p data-start="1113" data-end="1149">manda <code data-start="1119" data-end="1127">/start</code> <strong data-start="1128" data-end="1149">no privado do bot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1150" data-end="1187">
<p data-start="1153" data-end="1187">depois manda <code data-start="1166" data-end="1174">/start</code> <strong data-start="1175" data-end="1187">no canal</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>

<p data-start="1239" data-end="1284">👉 <strong data-start="1242" data-end="1284">os botões 0–36 apareceram no Telegram?</strong></p>
<p data-start="1286" data-end="1354" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Se sim, fechamos com sucesso 🟢<br data-start="1317" data-end="1320">

<hr data-start="85" data-end="88">
<h1 data-start="90" data-end="125">✅ O QUE FAZER AGORA (BEM SIMPLES)</h1>
<h2 data-start="127" data-end="164">PASSO 1 — ADICIONAR O BOT NO CANAL</h2>
<p data-start="165" data-end="193">No <strong data-start="168" data-end="192">canal que você criou</strong>:</p>
<ol data-start="195" data-end="397">
<li data-start="195" data-end="233">
<p data-start="198" data-end="233">Toque em <strong data-start="207" data-end="233">Configurações do canal</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="234" data-end="262">
<p data-start="237" data-end="262">Vá em <strong data-start="243" data-end="262">Administradores</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="263" data-end="303">
<p data-start="266" data-end="303">Clique em <strong data-start="276" data-end="303">Adicionar administrador</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="304" data-end="337">
<p data-start="307" data-end="337">Escolha o bot <strong data-start="321" data-end="337">$Criptoplay$</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="338" data-end="387">
<p data-start="341" data-end="359">Marque pelo menos:</p>
<ul data-start="363" data-end="387">
<li data-start="363" data-end="387">
<p data-start="365" data-end="387">✅ <strong data-start="367" data-end="387">Enviar mensagens</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="388" data-end="397">
<p data-start="391" data-end="397">Salvar</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="399" data-end="455">⚠️ se o bot não for admin, <strong data-start="426" data-end="455">ele não funciona no canal</strong></p>
<hr data-start="457" data-end="460">
<h2 data-start="462" data-end="488">PASSO 2 — INICIAR O BOT</h2>
<p data-start="489" data-end="533">Ainda <strong data-start="495" data-end="514">dentro do canal</strong>, envie a mensagem:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="534" data-end="548"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="550" data-end="573">👉 agora deve aparecer:</p>
<ul data-start="574" data-end="621">
<li data-start="574" data-end="593">
<p data-start="576" data-end="593">a mensagem do bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="594" data-end="621">
<p data-start="596" data-end="621">os <strong data-start="599" data-end="621">botões de 0 até 36</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="623" data-end="626">
<h2 data-start="628" data-end="653">PASSO 3 — TESTE RÁPIDO</h2>
<ol data-start="654" data-end="757">
<li data-start="654" data-end="695">
<p data-start="657" data-end="695">Clique em qualquer número (ex: <strong data-start="688" data-end="694">17</strong>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="696" data-end="757">
<p data-start="699" data-end="707">Veja se:</p>
<ul data-start="711" data-end="757">
<li data-start="711" data-end="740">
<p data-start="713" data-end="740">o botão continua aparecendo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="744" data-end="757">
<p data-start="746" data-end="757">não dá erro</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="759" data-end="806">Se isso acontecer → <strong data-start="779" data-end="804">está funcionando 100%</strong> ✅</p>

</li>

<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="898" data-end="912"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start

<hr data-start="83" data-end="86">
<h1 data-start="88" data-end="119">❗ POR QUE VOCÊ NÃO ACHA O BOT</h1>
<p data-start="120" data-end="157">Normalmente é <strong data-start="134" data-end="156">1 desses 3 motivos</strong>:</p>
<p data-start="159" data-end="279">1️⃣ você está procurando pelo <strong data-start="189" data-end="197">nome</strong><br data-start="197" data-end="200">
2️⃣ o <strong data-start="206" data-end="218">username</strong> do bot é outro<br data-start="233" data-end="236">
3️⃣ o bot ainda não foi iniciado no privado</p>
<p data-start="281" data-end="311">vamos checar na ordem certa 👇</p>
<hr data-start="313" data-end="316">
<h1 data-start="318" data-end="361">✅ PASSO 1 — PEGAR O USERNAME CERTO DO BOT</h1>
<p data-start="363" data-end="410">Abra o <strong data-start="370" data-end="384">@BotFather</strong> no Telegram e faça assim:</p>
<ol data-start="412" data-end="421">
<li data-start="412" data-end="421">
<p data-start="415" data-end="421">Envie:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="422" data-end="437"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/mybots
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="2" data-start="438" data-end="528">
<li data-start="438" data-end="471">
<p data-start="441" data-end="471">Clique no bot <strong data-start="455" data-end="471">$Criptoplay$</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="472" data-end="498">
<p data-start="475" data-end="498">Clique em <strong data-start="485" data-end="498">API Token</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="499" data-end="528">
<p data-start="502" data-end="528">Olhe o <strong data-start="509" data-end="521">USERNAME</strong> do bot</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="530" data-end="567">⚠️ ele termina com <strong data-start="549" data-end="557">_bot</strong>, exemplo:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="568" data-end="590"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">Criptoplay_bot</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="592" data-end="656">👉 <strong data-start="595" data-end="636">é ESSE nome que você precisa procurar</strong>, não o nome bonito.</p>
<hr data-start="658" data-end="661">
<h1 data-start="663" data-end="700">✅ PASSO 2 — PROCURAR DO JEITO CERTO</h1>
<p data-start="701" data-end="735">No Telegram, na busca 🔍, escreva:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="736" data-end="759"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">css</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">@Criptoplay_bot</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="760" data-end="797">(exatamente como o BotFather mostrou)</p>
<p data-start="799" data-end="826">👉 se aparecer, toque nele.</p>
<hr data-start="828" data-end="831">
<h1 data-start="833" data-end="874">✅ PASSO 3 — INICIAR O BOT (OBRIGATÓRIO)</h1>
<p data-start="875" data-end="905">Quando abrir o bot no privado:</p>
<ol data-start="907" data-end="948">
<li data-start="907" data-end="938">
<p data-start="910" data-end="938">Clique em <strong data-start="920" data-end="931">Iniciar</strong><br data-start="931" data-end="934">
ou</p>
</li>
<li data-start="939" data-end="948">
<p data-start="942" data-end="948">Envie:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="949" data-end="963"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="965" data-end="1046">⚠️ se você não fizer isso, o bot <strong data-start="998" data-end="1021">não aparece direito</strong> para adicionar no canal.</p>
<hr data-start="1048" data-end="1051">
<h1 data-start="1053" data-end="1085">✅ PASSO 4 — ADICIONAR NO CANAL</h1>
<p data-start="1086" data-end="1115">Agora volte no seu <strong data-start="1105" data-end="1114">CANAL</strong>:</p>
<ol data-start="1117" data-end="1255">

</li>
<li data-start="1180" data-end="1215">

<hr data-start="1257" data-end="1260">
<h2 data-start="1262" data-end="1275">🧠 RESUMÃO</h2>
<p data-start="1276" data-end="1395">🔹 procurar pelo <strong data-start="1293" data-end="1305">username</strong>, não pelo nome<br data-start="1320" data-end="1323">
🔹 iniciar o bot no privado primeiro<br data-start="1359" data-end="1362">
🔹 só depois adicionar no canal</p>
<hr data-start="1397" data-end="1400">

<p data-start="1426" data-end="1451">Responde só isso pra mim:</p>

<hr data-start="147" data-end="150">
<h1 data-start="152" data-end="193">❗ POR QUE O BOT NÃO APARECE NA PESQUISA</h1>
<p data-start="195" data-end="282">Quando o bot <strong data-start="208" data-end="235">só aparece no BotFather</strong>, é porque <strong data-start="246" data-end="281">UMA dessas coisas não foi feita</strong>:</p>
<p data-start="284" data-end="423">1️⃣ o bot <strong data-start="294" data-end="314">não foi iniciado</strong><br data-start="314" data-end="317">
2️⃣ o username <strong data-start="332" data-end="362">não foi usado corretamente</strong><br data-start="362" data-end="365">
3️⃣ o Telegram <strong data-start="380" data-end="401">não indexou ainda</strong> (leva poucos minutos)</p>
<p data-start="425" data-end="461">vamos resolver <strong data-start="440" data-end="458">na ordem certa</strong> 👇</p>
<hr data-start="463" data-end="466">
<h1 data-start="468" data-end="509">✅ PASSO 1 — INICIAR O BOT (OBRIGATÓRIO)</h1>
<p data-start="511" data-end="523">No Telegram:</p>
<ol data-start="525" data-end="557">
<li data-start="525" data-end="547">

</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="558" data-end="573"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/mybots

<hr data-start="792" data-end="795">
<h1 data-start="797" data-end="837">✅ PASSO 2 — CONFIRMAR O USERNAME CERTO</h1>
<p data-start="838" data-end="905">Ainda no BotFather, veja o <strong data-start="865" data-end="877">USERNAME</strong> do bot.<br data-start="885" data-end="888">
Ele é algo assim:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="906" data-end="928"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">Criptoplay_bot</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="930" data-end="1018">⚠️ não procure pelo nome “Criptoplay”<br data-start="967" data-end="970">
procure <strong data-start="978" data-end="992">EXATAMENTE</strong> pelo username com <code data-start="1011" data-end="1017">_bot</code>.</p>
<hr data-start="1020" data-end="1023">
<h1 data-start="1025" data-end="1057">✅ PASSO 3 — AGUARDAR 2 MINUTOS</h1>
<p data-start="1058" data-end="1090">Depois de clicar em <strong data-start="1078" data-end="1089">Iniciar</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="1091" data-end="1143">
<li data-start="1091" data-end="1117">
<p data-start="1093" data-end="1117">espere <strong data-start="1100" data-end="1117">1 a 2 minutos</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1118" data-end="1143">
<p data-start="1120" data-end="1143">feche e abra o Telegram</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1145" data-end="1171">Isso é normal do Telegram.</p>
<hr data-start="1173" data-end="1176">
<h1 data-start="1178" data-end="1215">✅ PASSO 4 — PROCURAR DO JEITO CERTO</h1>
<p data-start="1216" data-end="1248">Na busca do Telegram 🔍, digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1249" data-end="1272"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">css</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">@Criptoplay_bot</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1274" data-end="1328">(se for outro username, use o que o BotFather mostrou)</p>
<p data-start="1330" data-end="1364">👉 agora ele <strong data-start="1343" data-end="1363">tem que aparecer</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1366" data-end="1369">
<h1 data-start="1371" data-end="1396">❌ SE AINDA NÃO APARECER</h1>
<p data-start="1397" data-end="1425">Faça isso (funciona sempre):</p>
<ol data-start="1427" data-end="1550">
<li data-start="1427" data-end="1501">
<p data-start="1430" data-end="1501">Copie o link do bot no BotFather<br data-start="1462" data-end="1465">
(algo como <code data-start="1479" data-end="1500">t.me/Criptoplay_bot</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1502" data-end="1542">
<p data-start="1505" data-end="1542">Cole esse link <strong data-start="1520" data-end="1542">direto no Telegram</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1543" data-end="1550">
<p data-start="1546" data-end="1550">Abra</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1552" data-end="1555">
<h2 data-start="1557" data-end="1569">🧠 RESUMO</h2>
<p data-start="1570" data-end="1649">✔ bot criado ✔<br data-start="1584" data-end="1587">
✔ bot iniciado ✔<br data-start="1603" data-end="1606">
✔ username correto ✔<br data-start="1626" data-end="1629">
➡️ agora ele aparece</p>
<hr data-start="1651" data-end="1654">
<h2 data-start="1656" data-end="1679">👉 ME CONFIRMA AGORA</h2>
<p data-start="1680" data-end="1788">Me diga <strong data-start="1688" data-end="1702">exatamente</strong> o username que aparece no BotFather<br data-start="1738" data-end="1741">
(e se você já clicou em <strong data-start="1765" data-end="1787">Open Bot / Iniciar</strong>)</p>
<p data-start="1790" data-end="1837" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">com isso eu resolvo o último detalhe contigo 👊</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] <hr data-start="150" data-end="153">
<h2 data-start="155" data-end="213">❗ O QUE É ESSA TELA “type a message / create new topic”</h2>
<p data-start="214" data-end="249">Essa tela aparece quando você está:</p>
<ul data-start="250" data-end="320">
<li data-start="250" data-end="277">
<p data-start="252" data-end="277">num <strong data-start="256" data-end="277">grupo com tópicos</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="278" data-end="320">
<p data-start="280" data-end="320">ou numa <strong data-start="288" data-end="320">área que NÃO é o chat do bot</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="322" data-end="362">👉 <strong data-start="325" data-end="361">ali o bot não vai aparecer mesmo</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="364" data-end="385">O bot <strong data-start="370" data-end="384">só aparece</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="386" data-end="462">
<li data-start="386" data-end="412">
<p data-start="388" data-end="412">no <strong data-start="391" data-end="412">chat privado dele</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="413" data-end="462">
<p data-start="415" data-end="462">ou quando você <strong data-start="430" data-end="462">adiciona como admin no canal</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="464" data-end="467">
<h1 data-start="469" data-end="504">✅ COMO ACHAR O BOT DO JEITO CERTO</h1>
<h2 data-start="506" data-end="540">PASSO 1 — ABRIR O BOT PELO LINK</h2>
<p data-start="541" data-end="577">Volte no <strong data-start="550" data-end="563">BotFather</strong> e faça assim:</p>
<ol data-start="579" data-end="589">
<li data-start="579" data-end="589">
<p data-start="582" data-end="589">Digite:</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="590" data-end="605"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/mybots
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="2" data-start="606" data-end="665">
<li data-start="606" data-end="639">
<p data-start="609" data-end="639">Clique no bot <strong data-start="623" data-end="639">$Criptoplay$</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="640" data-end="665">
<p data-start="643" data-end="665">Clique em <strong data-start="653" data-end="665">Open Bot</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="667" data-end="705">⚠️ isso abre o <strong data-start="682" data-end="705">chat privado do bot</strong></p>
<hr data-start="707" data-end="710">
<h2 data-start="712" data-end="738">PASSO 2 — INICIAR O BOT</h2>
<p data-start="739" data-end="754">No chat do bot:</p>
<ul data-start="755" data-end="781">
<li data-start="755" data-end="781">
<p data-start="757" data-end="781">clique em <strong data-start="767" data-end="778">INICIAR</strong><br>
ou</p>
</li>
</ul>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="782" data-end="796"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="798" data-end="843">👉 se aparecer qualquer resposta, está certo.</p>
<hr data-start="845" data-end="848">
<h2 data-start="850" data-end="884">PASSO 3 — AGORA VÁ NO SEU CANAL</h2>
<p data-start="885" data-end="925">No <strong data-start="888" data-end="912">CANAL que você criou</strong> (não grupo):</p>
<ol data-start="927" data-end="1095">
<li data-start="927" data-end="943">
<p data-start="930" data-end="943">Configurações</p>
</li>
<li data-start="944" data-end="962">
<p data-start="947" data-end="962">Administradores</p>
</li>
<li data-start="963" data-end="989">
<p data-start="966" data-end="989">Adicionar administrador</p>
</li>
<li data-start="990" data-end="1045">
<p data-start="993" data-end="1045">Procure o bot pelo <strong data-start="1012" data-end="1024">username</strong> (termina com <code data-start="1038" data-end="1044">_bot</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1046" data-end="1085">
<p data-start="1049" data-end="1085">Dê permissão de <strong data-start="1065" data-end="1085">Enviar mensagens</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1086" data-end="1095">
<p data-start="1089" data-end="1095">Salvar</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1097" data-end="1100">
<h2 data-start="1102" data-end="1130">PASSO 4 — ATIVAR NO CANAL</h2>
<p data-start="1131" data-end="1158">Dentro do <strong data-start="1141" data-end="1150">CANAL</strong>, envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1159" data-end="1173"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1175" data-end="1215">👉 agora sim aparecem os <strong data-start="1200" data-end="1215">botões 0–36</strong></p>
<hr data-start="1217" data-end="1220">
<h2 data-start="1222" data-end="1240">❌ NÃO FAÇA ISSO</h2>
<ul data-start="1241" data-end="1344">
<li data-start="1241" data-end="1270">
<p data-start="1243" data-end="1270">❌ não use grupo com tópicos</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1271" data-end="1301">
<p data-start="1273" data-end="1301">❌ não use “create new topic”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1302" data-end="1344">
<p data-start="1304" data-end="1344">❌ não tente usar o bot dentro de tópicos</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1346" data-end="1376">Use <strong data-start="1350" data-end="1375">CANAL ou chat privado</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1378" data-end="1381">
<h2 data-start="1383" data-end="1406">👉 ME CONFIRMA AGORA</h2>
<p data-start="1407" data-end="1424">Responde só isso:</p>
<p data-start="1426" data-end="1494">👉 você conseguiu <strong data-start="1444" data-end="1493">abrir o chat privado do bot e apertar INICIAR</strong>?</p>
<p data-start="1496" data-end="1548" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">sim ou não — com isso eu te guio no último ajuste 👍</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] <hr data-start="202" data-end="205">
<h1 data-start="207" data-end="251">🔴 PRIMEIRO: ESQUECE CANAL E RAILWAY AGORA</h1>
<p data-start="252" data-end="325">vamos <strong data-start="258" data-end="297">só achar o bot no Telegram primeiro</strong>.<br data-start="298" data-end="301">
sem isso, nada funciona.</p>
<hr data-start="327" data-end="330">
<h1 data-start="332" data-end="389">🟢 PASSO 1 — ABRIR O BOT PELO BOTFATHER (FUNCIONA 100%)</h1>
<p data-start="391" data-end="427">1️⃣ Abra <strong data-start="400" data-end="414">@BotFather</strong><br data-start="414" data-end="417">
2️⃣ Envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="428" data-end="443"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/mybots
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="444" data-end="503">3️⃣ Toque no bot <strong data-start="461" data-end="477">$Criptoplay$</strong><br>
4️⃣ Toque em <strong data-start="491" data-end="503">Open Bot</strong></p>
<p data-start="505" data-end="560">📌 <strong data-start="508" data-end="534">não é procurar na lupa</strong>, é <strong data-start="538" data-end="560">clicar em Open Bot</strong></p>
<p data-start="562" data-end="611">👉 isso abre o chat correto do bot, não tem erro.</p>
<hr data-start="613" data-end="616">
<h1 data-start="618" data-end="646">🟢 PASSO 2 — INICIAR O BOT</h1>
<p data-start="647" data-end="674">Quando abrir o chat do bot:</p>
<p data-start="676" data-end="719">1️⃣ Clique em <strong data-start="690" data-end="701">INICIAR</strong><br data-start="701" data-end="704">
ou<br data-start="706" data-end="709">
2️⃣ Envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="720" data-end="734"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start

<h1 data-start="800" data-end="827">🟢 PASSO 3 — TESTE RÁPIDO</h1>
<p data-start="828" data-end="856">No mesmo chat do bot, envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="857" data-end="871"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="873" data-end="882">Se o bot:</p>
<ul data-start="883" data-end="927">
<li data-start="883" data-end="897">
<p data-start="885" data-end="897">não der erro</p>
</li>
<li data-start="898" data-end="927">
<p data-start="900" data-end="927">ou responder qualquer coisa</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="929" data-end="961">👉 <strong data-start="932" data-end="961">o bot EXISTE e está ativo</strong></p>
<hr data-start="963" data-end="966">
<h1 data-start="968" data-end="1004">🔴 SE AINDA NÃO ABRIR (IMPORTANTE)</h1>
<p data-start="1005" data-end="1066">Isso só acontece se <strong data-start="1025" data-end="1052">o bot foi criado errado</strong> no BotFather.</p>
<p data-start="1068" data-end="1094">Confere isso comigo agora:</p>
<p data-start="1096" data-end="1187">1️⃣ no BotFather, o bot tem <strong data-start="1124" data-end="1136">USERNAME</strong> terminado em <code data-start="1150" data-end="1156">_bot</code>?<br data-start="1157" data-end="1160">
(exemplo: <code data-start="1170" data-end="1186">Criptoplay_bot</code>)</p>
<p data-start="1189" data-end="1271">2️⃣ quando você clica em <strong data-start="1214" data-end="1226">Open Bot</strong>, ele abre uma conversa <strong data-start="1250" data-end="1271">ou não abre nada?</strong></p>
<p data-start="1273" data-end="1299">👉 responde assim pra mim:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1300" data-end="1337"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>1 sim / não
2 abre / não abre
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

<p data-start="125" data-end="235">👉 <strong data-start="128" data-end="192">o bot está ligado, mas responde só no CANAL (não no privado)</strong><br data-start="192" data-end="195">
e isso está <strong data-start="207" data-end="234">correto para o seu caso</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="237" data-end="303">vamos seguir <strong data-start="250" data-end="295">sem tentar fazer ele responder no privado</strong>, ok? 👇</p>
<hr data-start="305" data-end="308">
<h1 data-start="310" data-end="340">✅ AGORA FAZ ASSIM (FUNCIONA)</h1>
<h2 data-start="342" data-end="380">PASSO 1 — CONFIRMA QUE O BOT EXISTE</h2>
<p data-start="381" data-end="399">Se você conseguiu:</p>
<ul data-start="400" data-end="456">
<li data-start="400" data-end="432">
<p data-start="402" data-end="432">abrir o bot pelo <strong data-start="419" data-end="432">BotFather</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="433" data-end="456">
<p data-start="435" data-end="456">clicar em <strong data-start="445" data-end="456">Iniciar</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="458" data-end="520">👉 então o bot <strong data-start="473" data-end="496">EXISTE e ESTÁ ATIVO</strong> ✅<br data-start="498" data-end="501">
mesmo sem resposta.</p>
<hr data-start="522" data-end="525">
<h2 data-start="527" data-end="583">PASSO 2 — ADICIONAR O BOT NO CANAL (PARTE IMPORTANTE)</h2>
<p data-start="585" data-end="613">No <strong data-start="588" data-end="612">CANAL que você criou</strong>:</p>
<ol data-start="615" data-end="890">
<li data-start="615" data-end="644">
<p data-start="618" data-end="644">Entre em <strong data-start="627" data-end="644">Configurações</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="645" data-end="673">
<p data-start="648" data-end="673">Vá em <strong data-start="654" data-end="673">Administradores</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="674" data-end="714">
<p data-start="677" data-end="714">Clique em <strong data-start="687" data-end="714">Adicionar administrador</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="715" data-end="822">
<p data-start="718" data-end="822">No campo de busca, <strong data-start="737" data-end="763">cole o username do bot</strong><br>
(exemplo: <code data-start="777" data-end="794">@Criptoplay_bot</code>)<br>
⚠️ não digite, <strong data-start="814" data-end="822">cole</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="823" data-end="841">
<p data-start="826" data-end="841">Selecione o bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="842" data-end="880">
<p data-start="845" data-end="852">Marque:</p>
<ul data-start="856" data-end="880">
<li data-start="856" data-end="880">
<p data-start="858" data-end="880">✅ <strong data-start="860" data-end="880">Enviar mensagens</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="881" data-end="890">
<p data-start="884" data-end="890">Salvar</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="892" data-end="940">👉 isso é o que faz o bot “aparecer” de verdade.</p>
<hr data-start="942" data-end="945">
<h2 data-start="947" data-end="975">PASSO 3 — ATIVAR NO CANAL</h2>
<p data-start="976" data-end="1010">Agora, <strong data-start="983" data-end="1002">dentro do canal</strong>, envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1011" data-end="1025"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1027" data-end="1064">📌 <strong data-start="1030" data-end="1048">não no privado</strong>, é <strong data-start="1052" data-end="1064">NO CANAL</strong></p>
<hr data-start="1066" data-end="1069">
<h2 data-start="1071" data-end="1094">O QUE DEVE ACONTECER</h2>
<ul data-start="1095" data-end="1154">
<li data-start="1095" data-end="1122">
<p data-start="1097" data-end="1122">aparece a mensagem do bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1123" data-end="1154">
<p data-start="1125" data-end="1154">aparecem os <strong data-start="1137" data-end="1154">botões 0 a 36</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1156" data-end="1212">se isso acontecer → <strong data-start="1176" data-end="1209">acabou, está 100% funcionando</strong> 🎉</p>
<hr data-start="1214" data-end="1217">
<h2 data-start="1219" data-end="1239">❌ SE NÃO APARECER</h2>
<p data-start="1240" data-end="1276">Me responde <strong data-start="1252" data-end="1263">só isso</strong>, bem direto:</p>
<p data-start="1278" data-end="1418">1️⃣ o bot aparece na lista de <strong data-start="1308" data-end="1336">administradores do canal</strong>? (sim / não)<br data-start="1349" data-end="1352">
2️⃣ você mandou <code data-start="1368" data-end="1376">/start</code> <strong data-start="1377" data-end="1389">no canal</strong>, não no privado? (sim / não)</p>
<p data-start="1420" data-end="1435">Responde assim:</p>

<hr data-start="142" data-end="145">
<h2 data-start="147" data-end="171">🔴 VERDADE IMPORTANTE</h2>
<p data-start="172" data-end="254">Se você <strong data-start="180" data-end="214">não acha o bot em lugar nenhum</strong>, então <strong data-start="222" data-end="253">UMA dessas coisas é verdade</strong>:</p>
<h3 data-start="256" data-end="319">👉 1️⃣ o bot <strong data-start="273" data-end="317">NÃO foi criado corretamente no BotFather</strong></h3>
<h3 data-start="320" data-end="393">👉 2️⃣ você está procurando do jeito errado (nome em vez de username)</h3>
<p data-start="395" data-end="432">vamos eliminar isso <strong data-start="415" data-end="431">em 2 minutos</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="434" data-end="437">
<h1 data-start="439" data-end="487">✅ PASSO 1 — CONFERIR SE O BOT REALMENTE EXISTE</h1>
<p data-start="489" data-end="534">Abra o <strong data-start="496" data-end="510">@BotFather</strong> e faça EXATAMENTE isso:</p>
<p data-start="536" data-end="547">1️⃣ Digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="548" data-end="563"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/mybots
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="565" data-end="608">👉 <strong data-start="568" data-end="608">aparece o bot $Criptoplay$ na lista?</strong></p>
<ul data-start="610" data-end="708">
<li data-start="610" data-end="646">
<p data-start="612" data-end="646">✅ se <strong data-start="617" data-end="624">SIM</strong> → vá para o PASSO 2</p>
</li>
<li data-start="647" data-end="708">
<p data-start="649" data-end="708">❌ se <strong data-start="654" data-end="661">NÃO</strong> → o bot <strong data-start="670" data-end="684">NÃO existe</strong> e precisa criar de novo</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="710" data-end="742">⚠️ responde isso pra mim depois.</p>
<hr data-start="744" data-end="747">
<h1 data-start="749" data-end="789">✅ PASSO 2 — PEGAR O LINK DIRETO DO BOT</h1>
<p data-start="790" data-end="809">Ainda no BotFather:</p>
<p data-start="811" data-end="872">1️⃣ Toque no bot <strong data-start="828" data-end="844">$Criptoplay$</strong><br data-start="844" data-end="847">
2️⃣ Toque em <strong data-start="860" data-end="872">Open Bot</strong></p>
<p data-start="874" data-end="907">👉 isso abre um <strong data-start="890" data-end="898">LINK</strong> do tipo:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="908" data-end="944"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">arduino</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>https:</span><span><span class="hljs-comment">//t.me/NOME_DO_BOT_bot</span></span><span>

<p data-start="946" data-end="968">📌 <strong data-start="949" data-end="968">copie esse link</strong></p>
<hr data-start="970" data-end="973">
<h1 data-start="975" data-end="1013">✅ PASSO 3 — ABRIR O LINK (SEM BUSCA)</h1>
<p data-start="1014" data-end="1083">Agora:<br>
1️⃣ cole esse link <strong data-start="1040" data-end="1062">direto no Telegram</strong><br>
2️⃣ aperte <strong data-start="1074" data-end="1083">Enter</strong></p>
<p data-start="1085" data-end="1130">⚠️ <strong data-start="1088" data-end="1106">não use a lupa</strong>, não procure pelo nome.</p>
<p data-start="1132" data-end="1192">Se o bot existir, ele <strong data-start="1154" data-end="1167">VAI abrir</strong>, não tem como não abrir.</p>
<hr data-start="1194" data-end="1197">
<h1 data-start="1199" data-end="1222">❌ SE O LINK NÃO ABRIR</h1>
<p data-start="1223" data-end="1248">Então é certeza absoluta:</p>
<p data-start="1250" data-end="1327">👉 <strong data-start="1253" data-end="1291">o bot foi criado errado ou apagado</strong><br data-start="1291" data-end="1294">
👉 <strong data-start="1297" data-end="1327">não tem como usar esse bot</strong></p>
<p data-start="1329" data-end="1377">e a solução é <strong data-start="1343" data-end="1360">CRIAR DE NOVO</strong>, o que é rápido.</p>
<hr data-start="1379" data-end="1382">
<h1 data-start="1384" data-end="1421">🔁 COMO CRIAR DE NOVO (SE PRECISAR)</h1>
<p data-start="1422" data-end="1440">No <strong data-start="1425" data-end="1439">@BotFather</strong>:</p>
<p data-start="1442" data-end="1445">1️⃣</p>

<h1 data-start="122" data-end="157">✅ AGORA FAÇA ISSO (PASSO A PASSO)</h1>

agora vamos fazer <strong data-start="84" data-end="116">o método que SEMPRE funciona</strong>, mesmo quando copiar/colar não vai.</p>
<p data-start="154" data-end="198">👉 lê e faz <strong data-start="166" data-end="180">exatamente</strong>, sem pular linha.</p>
<hr data-start="200" data-end="203">
<h1 data-start="205" data-end="232">🔴 A VERDADE (IMPORTANTE)</h1>
<p data-start="233" data-end="347">Se <strong data-start="236" data-end="284">copiar e colar o username não adiciona o bot</strong>, então <strong data-start="292" data-end="317">o problema NÃO é você</strong>.<br data-start="318" data-end="321">
É <strong data-start="323" data-end="346">uma dessas 3 coisas</strong>:</p>
<p data-start="349" data-end="499">1️⃣ você está tentando adicionar no <strong data-start="385" data-end="401">lugar errado</strong><br data-start="401" data-end="404">
2️⃣ o bot <strong data-start="414" data-end="447">não foi iniciado corretamente</strong><br data-start="447" data-end="450">
3️⃣ o canal é do tipo errado (ou você não é dono)</p>
<p data-start="501" data-end="539">vamos resolver <strong data-start="516" data-end="531">uma por uma</strong>, agora.</p>
<hr data-start="541" data-end="544">
<h1 data-start="546" data-end="595">🟢 TESTE 1 — CONFIRMAR QUE VOCÊ É DONO DO CANAL</h1>
<p data-start="596" data-end="605">No canal:</p>
<ol data-start="607" data-end="661">
<li data-start="607" data-end="632">
<p data-start="610" data-end="632">Abra <strong data-start="615" data-end="632">Configurações</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="633" data-end="661">
<p data-start="636" data-end="661">Vá em <strong data-start="642" data-end="661">Administradores</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="663" data-end="707">👉 seu nome aparece como <strong data-start="688" data-end="706">Criador / Dono</strong>?</p>
<ul data-start="709" data-end="812">
<li data-start="709" data-end="732">
<p data-start="711" data-end="732">✅ se SIM → continue</p>
</li>
<li data-start="733" data-end="812">
<p data-start="735" data-end="812">❌ se NÃO → <strong data-start="746" data-end="774">não dá pra adicionar bot</strong>, tem que usar um canal que VOCÊ criou</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="814" data-end="848">⚠️ me diga se é SIM ou NÃO depois.</p>
<hr data-start="850" data-end="853">
<h1 data-start="855" data-end="911">🟢 TESTE 2 — ADICIONAR O BOT PELO LINK (FUNCIONA 100%)</h1>
<p data-start="912" data-end="938">Não use busca. Faça assim:</p>
<ol data-start="940" data-end="1099">
<li data-start="940" data-end="962">
<p data-start="943" data-end="962">Vá no <strong data-start="949" data-end="962">BotFather</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="963" data-end="978">
<p data-start="966" data-end="978">Toque no bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="979" data-end="1003">
<p data-start="982" data-end="1003">Toque em <strong data-start="991" data-end="1003">Open Bot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1004" data-end="1052">
<p data-start="1007" data-end="1052">No topo da conversa, toque no <strong data-start="1037" data-end="1052">nome do bot</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1053" data-end="1099">
<p data-start="1056" data-end="1099">Vai aparecer <strong data-start="1069" data-end="1099">Adicionar ao grupo / canal</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1101" data-end="1125">👉 escolha <strong data-start="1112" data-end="1125">SEU CANAL</strong></p>
<p data-start="1127" data-end="1166">⚠️ esse método ignora busca e username.</p>
<hr data-start="1168" data-end="1171">
<h1 data-start="1173" data-end="1212">🟢 TESTE 3 — INICIAR O BOT DE VERDADE</h1>
<p data-start="1213" data-end="1238">No chat do bot (privado):</p>
<p data-start="1240" data-end="1261">Envie <strong data-start="1246" data-end="1260">exatamente</strong>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1262" data-end="1276"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1278" data-end="1291">Depois envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1292" data-end="1306"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1307" data-end="1315">de novo.</p>
<p data-start="1317" data-end="1358">Mesmo sem resposta, isso <strong data-start="1342" data-end="1357">ativa o bot</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1360" data-end="1363">
<h1 data-start="1365" data-end="1404">🟢 TESTE 4 — TENTAR ADICIONAR DE NOVO</h1>
<p data-start="1405" data-end="1426">Agora volte no canal:</p>
<ol data-start="1428" data-end="1525">
<li data-start="1428" data-end="1446">
<p data-start="1431" data-end="1446">Configurações</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1447" data-end="1467">
<p data-start="1450" data-end="1467">Administradores</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1468" data-end="1496">
<p data-start="1471" data-end="1496">Adicionar administrador</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1497" data-end="1525">
<p data-start="1500" data-end="1525">Procure o bot <strong data-start="1514" data-end="1523">agora</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1527" data-end="1577">👉 ele costuma aparecer <strong data-start="1551" data-end="1576">só depois desse passo</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="1579" data-end="1582">
<h1 data-start="1584" data-end="1604">❌ SE AINDA NÃO DER</h1>
<p data-start="1605" data-end="1664">Então é <strong data-start="1613" data-end="1629">100% certeza</strong> que o bot foi criado com problema.</p>
<h3 data-start="1666" data-end="1700">🔁 SOLUÇÃO DEFINITIVA (RÁPIDA)</h3>
<p data-start="1701" data-end="1747">Vamos criar outro bot do zero (leva 1 minuto):</p>
<p data-start="1749" data-end="1766">No <strong data-start="1752" data-end="1765">BotFather</strong>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1767" data-end="1782"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/newbot

<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1789" data-end="1815"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">Criptoplay</span></span><span> Oficial

<hr data-start="1985" data-end="1988">
<h2 data-start="1990" data-end="2021">🙏 AGORA ME RESPONDE SÓ ISSO</h2>
<p data-start="2022" data-end="2055">Responde em <strong data-start="2034" data-end="2047">uma linha</strong>, assim:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="2057" data-end="2093"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">arduino</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>sou dono </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">do</span></span><span> canal: sim / não
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2095" data-end="2155" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">com isso eu sei <strong data-start="2111" data-end="2125">exatamente</strong> qual é o próximo passo
