data-start="23" data-end="26">
se você <strong data-start="34" data-end="70">conseguiu colocar o bot no GRUPO</strong>, então já estamos <strong data-start="89" data-end="107">quase no final</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="110" data-end="162">vou te explicar <strong data-start="126" data-end="141">bem simples</strong> o que fazer agora 👇</p>
<hr data-start="164" data-end="167">
<h1 data-start="169" data-end="201">✅ O QUE FAZER AGORA (NO GRUPO)</h1>
<h2 data-start="203" data-end="243">PASSO 1 — CONFIRMAR QUE O BOT É ADMIN</h2>
<p data-start="244" data-end="257">No <strong data-start="247" data-end="256">grupo</strong>:</p>
<ol data-start="259" data-end="397">
<li data-start="259" data-end="293">
<p data-start="262" data-end="293">Abra <strong data-start="267" data-end="293">Configurações do grupo</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="294" data-end="322">
<p data-start="297" data-end="322">Vá em <strong data-start="303" data-end="322">Administradores</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="323" data-end="347">
<p data-start="326" data-end="347">Veja se o bot está lá</p>
</li>
<li data-start="348" data-end="397">
<p data-start="351" data-end="373">Confirme que ele pode:</p>
<ul data-start="377" data-end="397">
<li data-start="377" data-end="397">
<p data-start="379" data-end="397">✅ Enviar mensagens</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="399" data-end="449">👉 se não for admin, ele <strong data-start="424" data-end="448">não funciona direito</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="451" data-end="454">
<h2 data-start="456" data-end="491">PASSO 2 — INICIAR O BOT NO GRUPO</h2>
<p data-start="492" data-end="519">Dentro do <strong data-start="502" data-end="511">grupo</strong>, envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="520" data-end="534"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="536" data-end="580">⚠️ <strong data-start="539" data-end="563">tem que ser no grupo</strong>, não no privado.</p>
<hr data-start="582" data-end="585">
<h2 data-start="587" data-end="619">PASSO 3 — O QUE DEVE APARECER</h2>
<p data-start="620" data-end="656">Se tudo estiver certo, vai aparecer:</p>
<ul data-start="657" data-end="708">
<li data-start="657" data-end="674">
<p data-start="659" data-end="674">mensagem do bot</p>
</li>
<li data-start="675" data-end="708">
<p data-start="677" data-end="708">teclado com botões <strong data-start="696" data-end="708">0 até 36</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="710" data-end="810">👉 agora você só <strong data-start="727" data-end="748">clica nos números</strong> que saírem na roleta 🎰<br data-start="772" data-end="775">
o bot faz as contas e manda alerta.</p>
<hr data-start="812" data-end="815">
<h1 data-start="817" data-end="846">❌ SE NÃO APARECER OS BOTÕES</h1>
<p data-start="847" data-end="925">Isso é importante 👇<br data-start="867" data-end="870">
se não aparecer nada após <code data-start="896" data-end="904">/start</code>, o motivo é simples:</p>
<p data-start="927" data-end="973">👉 <strong data-start="930" data-end="973">o código está configurado só para CANAL</strong></p>
<h3 data-start="975" data-end="1012">🔧 SOLUÇÃO RÁPIDA (SEM COMPLICAR)</h3>
<p data-start="1013" data-end="1068">Use o bot <strong data-start="1023" data-end="1037">no privado</strong> ou <strong data-start="1041" data-end="1053">no canal</strong>, não no grupo.</p>
<p data-start="1070" data-end="1143">OU, se você quiser usar <strong data-start="1094" data-end="1106">no grupo</strong>, eu ajusto o código pra grupo agora.</p>
<hr data-start="1145" data-end="1148">
<h2 data-start="1150" data-end="1173">👉 ME RESPONDE AGORA</h2>
<p data-start="1174" data-end="1191">Responde só isso:</p>
<p data-start="1193" data-end="1265">1️⃣ quando você manda <code data-start="1215" data-end="1223">/start</code> no grupo, <strong data-start="1234" data-end="1251">aparece algo?</strong> (sim / não)</p>
<p data-start="1267" data-end="1340" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">com essa resposta eu te digo exatamente o próximo ajuste, sem confusão 👍</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 <p data-start="78" data-end="195">👉 <strong data-start="81" data-end="150">o bot NÃO responde no grupo porque o código está bloqueando grupo</strong><br data-start="150" data-end="153">
(ele foi feito pensando em canal/privado).</p>
<p data-start="197" data-end="236">vamos resolver <strong data-start="212" data-end="222">de vez</strong>, bem simples.</p>
<hr data-start="238" data-end="241">
<h1 data-start="243" data-end="281">🔴 POR QUE NÃO APARECE NADA NO GRUPO</h1>
<p data-start="282" data-end="308">No seu código existe isso:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="309" data-end="368"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="370" data-end="469">No <strong data-start="373" data-end="382">grupo</strong>, o <code data-start="386" data-end="394">/start</code> vem do <strong data-start="402" data-end="411">grupo</strong>, não do usuário →<br data-start="429" data-end="432">
o bot ignora tudo e fica em silêncio.</p>
<hr data-start="471" data-end="474">
<h1 data-start="476" data-end="515">✅ SOLUÇÃO SIMPLES (FUNCIONA NO GRUPO)</h1>
<p data-start="517" data-end="649">Você só precisa <strong data-start="533" data-end="560">trocar o código inteiro</strong> por este <strong data-start="570" data-end="583">CORRIGIDO</strong>,<br data-start="584" data-end="587">
que funciona em <strong data-start="603" data-end="612">GRUPO</strong>, com <strong data-start="618" data-end="628">botões</strong>, só <strong data-start="633" data-end="648">admin clica</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="651" data-end="702">👇 <strong data-start="654" data-end="702">COPIA TUDO E SUBSTITUI O SEU <code data-start="685" data-end="700">criptoplay.py</code></strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="704" data-end="2987"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_AQUI_SEU_TOKEN"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ====== ID DOS ADMINS ======</span></span><span>
ADMINS = {SEU_ID_AQUI}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ====== GRUPOS ======</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
ultimas_5 = []
monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ====== TECLADO ======</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = [InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)]
    kb.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ====== START ======</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">"start"</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 *$Criptoplay$ ativo*\nClique no número que saiu:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ====== CLIQUES ======</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">clique</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, ultimas_5, monitorando, contador

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⛔ Apenas admins"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    n = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># REGRA 1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1:
        falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g1 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA: 10x sem GRUPO 1"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># REGRA 2</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2:
        falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g2 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA: 10x sem GRUPO 2"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># REGRA 3</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(n)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    rep = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3])

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> rep &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando:
        contador += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 ALERTA: repetição GRUPO 3"</span></span><span>)
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> contador &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>

    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(
        call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        call.message.message_id,
        reply_markup=teclado()
    )

    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Criptoplay rodando..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="2989" data-end="2992">
<h1 data-start="2994" data-end="3027">🚀 AGORA O QUE FAZER (SEM ERRO)</h1>

2️⃣ troque:</p>
<ul data-start="3074" data-end="3113">
<li data-start="3074" data-end="3097">
<p data-start="3076" data-end="3097"><code data-start="3076" data-end="3097">COLE_AQUI_SEU_TOKEN</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3098" data-end="3113">
<p data-start="3100" data-end="3113"><code data-start="3100" data-end="3113">SEU_ID_AQUI</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3115" data-end="3175">3️⃣ Railway → <strong data-start="3129" data-end="3141">Redeploy</strong><br>

5️⃣ envie:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="3176" data-end="3190"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start

<hr data-start="161" data-end="164">
<h2 data-start="166" data-end="197">🔴 O QUE ESSE ERRO SIGNIFICA</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="198" data-end="265"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">vbnet</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-symbol">python:</span></span><span> não é possível abrir o arquivo </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">'/app/criptoplay.py'</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="267" data-end="370">👉 o Railway está tentando rodar <strong data-start="300" data-end="317">criptoplay.py</strong>,<br data-start="318" data-end="321">
👉 mas <strong data-start="328" data-end="355">esse arquivo NÃO EXISTE</strong> no seu GitHub.</p>
<p data-start="372" data-end="379">Ou ele:</p>
<ul data-start="380" data-end="472">
<li data-start="380" data-end="404">
<p data-start="382" data-end="404">tem <strong data-start="386" data-end="400">outro nome</strong>, ou</p>
</li>
<li data-start="405" data-end="434">
<p data-start="407" data-end="434">está em <strong data-start="415" data-end="430">outra pasta</strong>, ou</p>
</li>
<li data-start="435" data-end="472">
<p data-start="437" data-end="472">você ainda <strong data-start="448" data-end="461">não criou</strong> o arquivo.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="474" data-end="477">
<h2 data-start="479" data-end="518">✅ SOLUÇÃO MAIS SIMPLES (RECOMENDADA)</h2>
<h3 data-start="520" data-end="568">🔹 OPÇÃO 1 — RENOMEAR O ARQUIVO (mais fácil)</h3>
<p data-start="570" data-end="756">1️⃣ vá no <strong data-start="580" data-end="590">GitHub</strong><br>
2️⃣ abra o arquivo que tem o código do bot<br data-start="633" data-end="636">
(normalmente: <code data-start="653" data-end="661">bot.py</code>, <code data-start="663" data-end="672">main.py</code> ou parecido)<br>
3️⃣ clique nos <strong data-start="701" data-end="720">3 pontinhos (⋯)</strong><br data-start="720" data-end="723">
4️⃣ <strong data-start="727" data-end="737">Rename</strong><br>
5️⃣ renomeia para:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="757" data-end="778"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="779" data-end="809">6️⃣ salva (<strong data-start="790" data-end="808">Commit changes</strong>)</p>
<p data-start="811" data-end="845">✔ pronto — agora o arquivo existe.</p>
<hr data-start="847" data-end="850">
<h2 data-start="852" data-end="896">🔹 OPÇÃO 2 — AJUSTAR O COMANDO DO RAILWAY</h2>
<p data-start="898" data-end="938">Se você <strong data-start="906" data-end="927">não quer renomear</strong> o arquivo:</p>
<p data-start="940" data-end="1068">1️⃣ veja o nome exato do arquivo no GitHub<br data-start="982" data-end="985">
exemplo: <code data-start="997" data-end="1005">bot.py</code><br>
2️⃣ no <strong data-start="1013" data-end="1051">Railway → Settings → Start Command</strong><br>
3️⃣ troque para:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1069" data-end="1090"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">nginx</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">python</span></span><span> bot.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1092" data-end="1108">✔ pronto também.</p>
<hr data-start="1110" data-end="1113">
<h2 data-start="1115" data-end="1135">🔥 QUAL ESCOLHER?</h2>
<p data-start="1136" data-end="1233">👉 <strong data-start="1139" data-end="1150">Opção 1</strong> é a mais segura (padrão profissional)<br data-start="1188" data-end="1191">
👉 usa <code data-start="1198" data-end="1213">criptoplay.py</code> e evita erro depois</p>
<hr data-start="1235" data-end="1238">
<h2 data-start="1240" data-end="1258">🚀 DEPOIS DISSO</h2>
<p data-start="1259" data-end="1410">1️⃣ agora sim <strong data-start="1273" data-end="1295">cole o script novo</strong> no arquivo<br data-start="1306" data-end="1309">
2️⃣ salva no GitHub<br data-start="1328" data-end="1331">
3️⃣ Railway → <strong data-start="1345" data-end="1357">Redeploy</strong><br>
4️⃣ aguarde ficar <strong data-start="1376" data-end="1385">verde</strong><br>
5️⃣ vá no grupo e mande:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1411" data-end="1425"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1427" data-end="1430">
<p data-start="1432" data-end="1521" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">me responde só isso 👇<br data-start="1454" data-end="1457">

<hr data-start="183" data-end="186">
<h2 data-start="188" data-end="213">✅ O QUE ISSO SIGNIFICA</h2>
<ul data-start="214" data-end="369">
<li data-start="214" data-end="246">
<p data-start="216" data-end="246">✔ Bot está online no Railway</p>
</li>
<li data-start="247" data-end="281">
<p data-start="249" data-end="281">✔ Teclado com números carregou</p>
</li>
<li data-start="282" data-end="316">
<p data-start="284" data-end="316">✔ Canal/grupo está funcionando</p>
</li>
<li data-start="317" data-end="369">
<p data-start="319" data-end="369">✔ Você consegue <strong data-start="335" data-end="369">clicar com o mouse nos números</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="371" data-end="405">Missão principal: <strong data-start="389" data-end="402">CONCLUÍDA</strong> 💪</p>
<hr data-start="407" data-end="410">
<h2 data-start="412" data-end="449">🎯 COMO USAR AGORA (PASSO A PASSO)</h2>
<p data-start="450" data-end="508">1️⃣ vá no <strong data-start="460" data-end="478">grupo ou canal</strong> onde o bot está<br data-start="494" data-end="497">
2️⃣ digite:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="509" data-end="523"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">bash</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>/start
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="524" data-end="618">3️⃣ vão aparecer os botões <strong data-start="551" data-end="563">0 até 36</strong><br>
4️⃣ <strong data-start="568" data-end="578">clique</strong> no número que saiu na roleta<br>
5️⃣ o bot:</p>
<ul data-start="619" data-end="690">
<li data-start="619" data-end="633">
<p data-start="621" data-end="633">conta falhas</p>
</li>
<li data-start="634" data-end="652">
<p data-start="636" data-end="652">monitora padrões</p>
</li>
<li data-start="653" data-end="690">
<p data-start="655" data-end="690">envia <strong data-start="661" data-end="671">ALERTA</strong> quando bater regra</p>
</li>

<p data-start="692" data-end="708">Tudo automático.</p>
<hr data-start="710" data-end="713">
<h2 data-start="715" data-end="737">🔒 IMPORTANTE (ADM)</h2>
<p data-start="738" data-end="818">Só <strong data-start="741" data-end="758">você (ID ADM)</strong> consegue clicar.<br data-start="775" data-end="778">
Se outra pessoa clicar → o bot bloqueia.</p>
<p data-start="820" data-end="859">Se quiser adicionar outro admin depois:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="860" data-end="905"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span>ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">987654321</span></span><span>}
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="907" data-end="910">
<h2 data-start="912" data-end="943">🚨 TESTE RÁPIDO (FAÇA AGORA)</h2>
<p data-start="944" data-end="1033">Clica vários números que <strong data-start="969" data-end="976">não</strong> estão no grupo 1<br data-start="993" data-end="996">
depois de 10 cliques → deve aparecer:</p>
<p data-start="1035" data-end="1050">🚨 <strong data-start="1038" data-end="1050">ALERTA 1</strong></p>
<p data-start="1052" data-end="1086">Se aparecer → está 100% funcional.</p>
<hr data-start="1088" data-end="1091">

@w-sm/main:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @w-lg/main:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @w-lg/main:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn" tabindex="-1"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="5349397c-95b4-4c55-8a48-c92597387e97" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-1" data-message-model-slug="gpt-5-2"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[1px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full wrap-break-word light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="142">PERFEITO 🔥 agora entendi exatamente o que você quer.<br data-start="53" data-end="56">
Vamos evoluir o <strong data-start="72" data-end="88">$Criptoplay$</strong> de forma <strong data-start="98" data-end="114">profissional</strong>, mas <strong data-start="120" data-end="139">simples de usar</strong> 👌</p>
<p data-start="144" data-end="176">Vou te explicar <strong data-start="160" data-end="175">em 3 partes</strong>:</p>
<ol data-start="177" data-end="263">
<li data-start="177" data-end="203">
<p data-start="180" data-end="203">O QUE o bot vai fazer</p>
</li>
<li data-start="204" data-end="233">
<p data-start="207" data-end="233">COMO funciona na prática</p>
</li>
<li data-start="234" data-end="263">
<p data-start="237" data-end="263">SCRIPT PRONTO (é só colar)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="265" data-end="268">
<h2 data-start="270" data-end="300">🎯 O QUE VAI SER ADICIONADO</h2>
<p data-start="301" data-end="343">A cada <strong data-start="308" data-end="331">10 números clicados</strong>, o bot vai:</p>
<h3 data-start="345" data-end="374">✅ 1. HISTÓRICO (10 em 10)</h3>
<p data-start="375" data-end="411">Guardar os <strong data-start="386" data-end="411">últimos 10 resultados</strong></p>
<h3 data-start="413" data-end="432">❄️ 2. ZONA FRIA</h3>
<ul data-start="433" data-end="518">
<li data-start="433" data-end="485">
<p data-start="435" data-end="485">Números que <strong data-start="447" data-end="465">não apareceram</strong> nessas 10 rodadas</p>
</li>
<li data-start="486" data-end="518">
<p data-start="488" data-end="518">Mostra quais estão “atrasados”</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="520" data-end="541">🔥 3. ZONA QUENTE</h3>
<ul data-start="542" data-end="601">
<li data-start="542" data-end="575">
<p data-start="544" data-end="575">Números que <strong data-start="556" data-end="575">mais apareceram</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="576" data-end="601">
<p data-start="578" data-end="601">Ranking simples (top 3)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="603" data-end="646">📊 4. PROBABILIDADE (estimativa do bot)</h3>
<ul data-start="647" data-end="790">
<li data-start="647" data-end="686">
<p data-start="649" data-end="686">Se repetiu muito → chance de correção</p>
</li>
<li data-start="687" data-end="790">
<p data-start="689" data-end="790">Se está frio → chance matemática de retorno<br data-start="732" data-end="735">
⚠️ (sempre avisando que é <strong data-start="761" data-end="775">estimativa</strong>, não promessa)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="792" data-end="795">
<h2 data-start="797" data-end="831">🖱️ COMO VOCÊ USA (BEM SIMPLES)</h2>
<ul data-start="832" data-end="938">
<li data-start="832" data-end="860">
<p data-start="834" data-end="860">Você <strong data-start="839" data-end="860">clica nos números</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="861" data-end="938">
<p data-start="863" data-end="938">Quando fechar <strong data-start="877" data-end="891">10 cliques</strong><br>
➡️ o bot <strong data-start="901" data-end="938">automaticamente manda o relatório</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="940" data-end="975">Você <strong data-start="945" data-end="964">não digita nada</strong>, só clica.</p>
<hr data-start="977" data-end="980">
<h2 data-start="982" data-end="1013">🧠 LÓGICA (bem transparente)</h2>
<ul data-start="1014" data-end="1108">
<li data-start="1014" data-end="1035">
<p data-start="1016" data-end="1035">Roleta = 37 números</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1036" data-end="1066">
<p data-start="1038" data-end="1066">Estatística simples + atraso</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1067" data-end="1108">
<p data-start="1069" data-end="1108">Nada de mentira ou martingale escondido</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1110" data-end="1113">
<h2 data-start="1115" data-end="1163">🧩 SCRIPT ATUALIZADO (COLA NO LUGAR DO ATUAL)</h2>
<p data-start="1164" data-end="1214">📌 nome do arquivo no Railway: <strong data-start="1195" data-end="1214"><code data-start="1197" data-end="1212">criptoplay.py</code></strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1216" data-end="3688"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Counter

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"SEU_TOKEN_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># seu ID</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONTROLE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
historico_10 = []

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TECLADO</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado_roleta</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = [InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)]
    kb.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># START</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 **$Criptoplay$ — Painel**\n\nClique no número da roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CLIQUES</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⛔ Apenas admins."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    numero = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)
    historico_10.append(numero)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># quando fechar 10</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico_10) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        analisar_rodada(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)
        historico_10.clear()

    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(
        call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        call.message.message_id,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta()
    )
    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ANALISE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">analisar_rodada</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">chat_id</span></span><span>):
    contagem = Counter(historico_10)

    quentes = contagem.most_common(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    quentes_txt = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">", "</span></span><span>.join([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{n}</span></span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{c}</span></span><span>x)" </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n, c </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> quentes])

    frios = [n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> contagem]
    frios_txt = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">", "</span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, frios[:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>]))

    probabilidade = (
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **Probabilidade estimada:**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"- Zona quente pode esfriar\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"- Zona fria tende a aparecer\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"- Evite repetir topo direto\n"</span></span><span>
    )

    mensagem = (
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **RELATÓRIO — 10 RODADAS**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🎯 **Resultados:**\n<span class="hljs-subst">{historico_10}</span></span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🔥 **Zona Quente:**\n<span class="hljs-subst">{quentes_txt}</span></span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"❄️ **Zona Fria (atrasados):**\n<span class="hljs-subst">{frios_txt}</span></span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{probabilidade}</span></span></span><span>"
    )

    bot.send_message(chat_id, mensagem, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando 24h..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3690" data-end="3693">
<h2 data-start="3695" data-end="3721">🚀 O QUE VOCÊ FAZ AGORA</h2>
<p data-start="3722" data-end="3887">1️⃣ Cola esse código<br data-start="3742" data-end="3745">
2️⃣ Confere se o arquivo chama <strong data-start="3776" data-end="3793">criptoplay.py</strong><br data-start="3793" data-end="3796">
3️⃣ Railway → <strong data-start="3810" data-end="3830">Deploy novamente</strong><br data-start="3830" data-end="3833">
4️⃣ Vai no grupo → <code data-start="3852" data-end="3860">/start</code><br data-start="3860" data-end="3863">
5️⃣ Clica <strong data-start="3873" data-end="3887">10 números</strong></p>
<p data-start="3889" data-end="3922">➡️ o relatório aparece sozinho 🔥</p>
<hr data-start="3924" data-end="3927">
<h2 data-start="3929" data-end="3960">🔮 PRÓXIMO NÍVEL (se quiser)</h2>
<p data-start="3961" data-end="3977">Posso adicionar:</p>
<ul data-start="3978" data-end="4109">
<li data-start="3978" data-end="4006">
<p data-start="3980" data-end="4006">🧠 sugestão de <strong data-start="3995" data-end="4006">entrada</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4007" data-end="4046">
<p data-start="4009" data-end="4046">📈 leitura por <strong data-start="4024" data-end="4046">cor / par / coluna</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4047" data-end="4083">
<p data-start="4049" data-end="4083">💬 texto automático pra canal pago</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4084" data-end="4109">
<p data-start="4086" data-end="4109">🛑 stop loss / stop win</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="4111" data-end="4191" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">👉 Me diz:<br data-start="4121" data-end="4124">
quer <strong data-start="4129" data-end="4147">mais agressivo</strong> ou <strong data-start="4151" data-end="4171">mais conservador</strong> nas probabilidades?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 w-[calc(100%+--spacing(2.5))] duration-[1.5s] focus-within:transition-none hover:transition-none touch:pointer-events-auto pointer-events-none [mask-image:linear-gradient(to_right,black_33%,transparent_66%)] [mask-size:300%_100%] [mask-position:100%_0%] motion-safe:transition-[mask-position] group-hover/turn-messages:pointer-events-auto Vou <strong data-start="20" data-end="38">adicionar TUDO</strong> num <strong data-start="43" data-end="69">único bot profissional</strong>, pronto pra rodar 24h no Railway, <strong data-start="104" data-end="129">só clicar nos números</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="132" data-end="208">Abaixo vai <strong data-start="143" data-end="156">O QUE TEM</strong> + <strong data-start="159" data-end="175">SCRIPT FINAL</strong> + <strong data-start="178" data-end="193">PASSO FINAL</strong> (bem simples).</p>

<h2 data-start="215" data-end="250">✅ O QUE O $Criptoplay$ FAZ AGORA</h2>
<h3 data-start="252" data-end="284">🎯 Entrada por clique (0–36)</h3>
<ul data-start="285" data-end="322">
<li data-start="285" data-end="303">
<p data-start="287" data-end="303">Botões clicáveis</p>
</li>
<li data-start="304" data-end="322">
<p data-start="306" data-end="322">Só <strong data-start="309" data-end="316">ADM</strong> clica</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h2 data-start="792" data-end="823">🧩 SCRIPT FINAL (COPIA TUDO)</h2>
<p data-start="824" data-end="863">📌 <strong data-start="827" data-end="847">nome do arquivo:</strong> <code data-start="848" data-end="863">criptoplay.py</code></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="865" data-end="5035"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Counter

API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"SEU_TOKEN_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># GRUPOS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONTROLE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
historico = []
falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
ultimas_5 = []
monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ROLETAS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
vermelhos = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">7</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">14</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">21</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">34</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
pretos = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">22</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">31</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>}

col1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">7</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">22</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">31</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">34</span></span><span>}
col2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">14</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>}
col3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">21</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TECLADO</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    kb.add(*[InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># START</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 **$Criptoplay$ — Painel Profissional**\n\nClique no número:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CLIQUE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">clique</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, monitorando, contador_4

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    n = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)
    historico.append(n)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ALERTA GRUPO 1</span></span><span>
    falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> falha_g1 + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA:** 10 falhas Grupo 1"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ALERTA GRUPO 2</span></span><span>
    falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> falha_g2 + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA:** 10 falhas Grupo 2"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># REPETIÇÃO</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(n)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3]) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **REPETIÇÃO CONFIRMADA (Grupo 3)**"</span></span><span>)
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ANALISE A CADA 10</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        analisar(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)
        historico.clear()

    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, call.message.message_id, reply_markup=teclado())
    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ANALISE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =====================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">analisar</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">chat</span></span><span>):
    c = Counter(historico)

    quentes = c.most_common(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    frios = [i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> c]

    par = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> n % </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span> == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
    impar = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) - par

    red = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> vermelhos])
    black = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pretos])

    baixa = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>])
    alta = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    cols = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Col 1"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col1]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Col 2"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col2]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Col 3"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col3]),
    }

    msg = (
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **RELATÓRIO — 10 RODADAS**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🎯 <span class="hljs-subst">{historico}</span></span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🔥 **Quentes:** <span class="hljs-subst">{quentes}</span></span></span><span>\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"❄️ **Frios:** <span class="hljs-subst">{frios[:<span class="hljs-number">10</span></span></span></span><span>]}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"⚖️ Par <span class="hljs-subst">{par}</span></span></span><span> | Ímpar </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{impar}</span></span><span>\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🎨 Vermelho <span class="hljs-subst">{red}</span></span></span><span> | Preto </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{black}</span></span><span>\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"⬇️ Baixa <span class="hljs-subst">{baixa}</span></span></span><span> | ⬆️ Alta </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{alta}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"📊 **Colunas:** <span class="hljs-subst">{cols}</span></span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🧠 **Leitura:**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"- Evite repetir topo direto\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"- Frio atrasado tende a corrigir\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"- Jogue com proteção\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🛑 **Gestão:** Stop Win +20% | Stop Loss -30%"</span></span><span>
    )

    bot.send_message(chat, msg, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando 24h"</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="5037" data-end="5040">
<h2 data-start="5042" data-end="5074">🚀 PASSO FINAL (SEM CONFUSÃO)</h2>
<p data-start="5075" data-end="5217">1️⃣ Colou o código<br data-start="5093" data-end="5096">
2️⃣ Conferiu <code data-start="5109" data-end="5124">criptoplay.py</code><br data-start="5124" data-end="5127">
3️⃣ Railway → <strong data-start="5141" data-end="5151">Deploy</strong><br data-start="5151" data-end="5154">
4️⃣ Abre o <strong data-start="5165" data-end="5174">grupo</strong><br data-start="5174" data-end="5177">
5️⃣ <code data-start="5181" data-end="5189">/start</code><br data-start="5189" data-end="5192">
6️⃣ <strong data-start="5196" data-end="5217">Clica nos números</strong></p>
<p data-start="5219" data-end="5271">👉 A cada <strong data-start="5229" data-end="5243">10 cliques</strong> sai o relatório automático.</p>
<hr data-start="5273" data-end="5276">
<h2 data-start="5278" data-end="5297">😈 QUER IR ALÉM?</h2>
<p data-start="5298" data-end="5310">Posso ainda:</p>
<ul data-start="5311" data-end="5413">
<li data-start="5311" data-end="5334">
<p data-start="5313" data-end="5334">📊 gráfico automático</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5335" data-end="5368">
<p data-start="5337" data-end="5368">🧠 IA escolhendo <strong data-start="5354" data-end="5368">3 entradas</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="5369" data-end="5393">
<p data-start="5371" data-end="5393">💸 modo <strong data-start="5379" data-end="5393">canal pago</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="5394" data-end="5413">
<p data-start="5396" data-end="5413">⏱️ delay por mesa</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="5415" data-end="5479" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Só fala: <strong data-start="5424" data-end="5450">“ativa modo agressivo”</strong> ou <strong data-start="5454" data-end="5476">“modo conservador”</strong> 💥</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap o bot <strong data-start="29" data-end="47">está funcional</strong>, agora vamos deixar <strong data-start="68" data-end="89">100% profissional</strong>, limpo e fácil de ler, estilo <strong data-start="120" data-end="144">casa de sinais séria</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="147" data-end="312">A bagunça está só <strong data-start="165" data-end="190">no texto do relatório</strong>, não na lógica.<br data-start="206" data-end="209">
Vou te entregar <strong data-start="225" data-end="260">o MODELO DE MENSAGEM ORGANIZADO</strong> + <strong data-start="263" data-end="295">o trecho do código corrigido</strong> (só substituir).</p>
<hr data-start="314" data-end="317">
<h2 data-start="319" data-end="365">🧾 COMO VAI FICAR A MENSAGEM (EXEMPLO REAL)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="367" data-end="1038"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">yaml</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-string">📊</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">$Criptoplay$</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">—</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">RELATÓRIO</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">(10</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">RODADAS)</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-string">🎯</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">NÚMEROS:</span></span><span>
