<p data-start="1040" data-end="1084">Isso é <strong data-start="1047" data-end="1069">nível profissional</strong>, sem confusão.</p>
<hr data-start="1086" data-end="1089">
<h2 data-start="1091" data-end="1127">🔧 AGORA O QUE VOCÊ FAZ NO CÓDIGO</h2>
<p data-start="1128" data-end="1229">👉 <strong data-start="1131" data-end="1173">substitui APENAS a função <code data-start="1159" data-end="1171">analisar()</code></strong> pelo código abaixo<br data-start="1192" data-end="1195">
(o resto do script continua igual)</p>
<h3 data-start="1231" data-end="1267">✅ FUNÇÃO <code data-start="1244" data-end="1256">analisar()</code> ORGANIZADA</h3>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="1268" data-end="3346"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">analisar</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">chat</span></span><span>):
    c = Counter(historico)

    quentes = c.most_common(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    frios = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">sorted</span></span><span>([i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> c])

    pares = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> n % </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span> == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
    impares = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) - pares

    verm = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> vermelhos])
    pret = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pretos])

    baixa = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>])
    alta = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    colunas = {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Coluna 1"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col1]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Coluna 2"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col2]),
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Coluna 3"</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col3]),
    }

    duzia1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>])
    duzia2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>])
    duzia3 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    msg = (
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **$Criptoplay$ — RELATÓRIO (10 RODADAS)**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎯 **NÚMEROS:**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">' · '</span></span></span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, historico))}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔥 **ZONAS QUENTES**\n"</span></span><span> +
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>.join([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span></span></span></span><span>}️⃣ </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{n}</span></span><span> → </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{q}</span></span><span>x" </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i, (n, q) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">enumerate</span></span><span>(quentes)]) +
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n\n❄️ **ZONAS FRIAS**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">' · '</span></span></span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, frios[:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>]))}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⚖️ **PAR / ÍMPAR**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Par: <span class="hljs-subst">{pares}</span></span></span><span>\nÍmpar: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{impares}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎨 **COR**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Vermelho: <span class="hljs-subst">{verm}</span></span></span><span>\nPreto: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{pret}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⬆️⬇️ **ALTURA**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"0–18: <span class="hljs-subst">{baixa}</span></span></span><span>\n19–36: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{alta}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **COLUNAS**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Coluna 1: <span class="hljs-subst">{colunas[<span class="hljs-string">'Coluna 1'</span></span></span></span><span>]}\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Coluna 2: <span class="hljs-subst">{colunas[<span class="hljs-string">'Coluna 2'</span></span></span></span><span>]}\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Coluna 3: <span class="hljs-subst">{colunas[<span class="hljs-string">'Coluna 3'</span></span></span></span><span>]}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📦 **DÚZIAS**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"1ª: <span class="hljs-subst">{duzia1}</span></span></span><span>\n2ª: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{duzia2}</span></span><span>\n3ª: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{duzia3}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🧠 **LEITURA DO BOT**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"• Analise o atraso antes de entrar\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"• Evite repetir topo direto\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🛑 **Gestão:** Stop Win +20% | Stop Loss −30%"</span></span><span>
    )

    bot.send_message(chat, msg, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3348" data-end="3351">
<h2 data-start="3353" data-end="3373">✅ RESULTADO FINAL</h2>
<ul data-start="3374" data-end="3471">
<li data-start="3374" data-end="3396">
<p data-start="3376" data-end="3396">mensagens <strong data-start="3386" data-end="3396">limpas</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3397" data-end="3417">
<p data-start="3399" data-end="3417">leitura <strong data-start="3407" data-end="3417">rápida</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3418" data-end="3443">
<p data-start="3420" data-end="3443">padrão <strong data-start="3427" data-end="3443">profissional</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="3444" data-end="3471">

</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3473" data-end="3501">Se quiser, próximo passo eu:</p>
<ul data-start="3502" data-end="3606">
<li data-start="3502" data-end="3531">

<h2 data-start="374" data-end="428">✅ CÓDIGO FINAL — $Criptoplay$ (VERSÃO PROFISSIONAL)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="430" data-end="5853"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Counter

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONFIGURAÇÕES</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SEU_TOKEN_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># COLOQUE SEU ID AQUI</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># GRUPOS DE ALERTA</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}

grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ROLETAS</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
vermelhos = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">7</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">14</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">21</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">34</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
pretos   = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">22</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">31</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>}

col1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">7</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">22</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">31</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">34</span></span><span>}
col2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">14</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>}
col3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">21</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CONTROLE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
historico = []
falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
ultimas_5 = []
monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># TECLADO</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado_roleta</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    botoes = [InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)]
    kb.add(*botoes)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># START</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 **$Criptoplay$ — Painel Profissional**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"👉 Clique no número que saiu na roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta(),
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># CLIQUE</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">registrar</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, monitorando, contador_4

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⛔ Apenas ADM"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    n = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)
    historico.append(n)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- ALERTA GRUPO 1 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1:
        falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g1 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA:** 10 falhas — Grupo 1"</span></span><span>, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- ALERTA GRUPO 2 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2:
        falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        falha_g2 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA:** 10 falhas — Grupo 2"</span></span><span>, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- REPETIÇÃO GRUPO 3 --------</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(n)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    qtd = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3])

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> qtd &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 **ALERTA:** Repetição confirmada — Grupo 3"</span></span><span>, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># -------- RELATÓRIO A CADA 10 --------</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        analisar(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)
        historico.clear()

    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(
        call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        call.message.message_id,
        reply_markup=teclado_roleta()
    )
    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ANALISE PROFISSIONAL</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># =========================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">analisar</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">chat</span></span><span>):
    c = Counter(historico)
    quentes = c.most_common(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    frios = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">sorted</span></span><span>([i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> c])

    pares = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> n % </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span> == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
    impares = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) - pares

    verm = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> vermelhos])
    pret = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pretos])

    baixa = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>])
    alta  = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    col_1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col1])
    col_2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col2])
    col_3 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> col3])

    d1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>])
    d2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>])
    d3 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    msg = (
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **$Criptoplay$ — RELATÓRIO (10 RODADAS)**\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎯 **NÚMEROS:**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">' · '</span></span></span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, historico))}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔥 **ZONAS QUENTES**\n"</span></span><span> +
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>.join([</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span></span></span></span><span>}️⃣ </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{n}</span></span><span> → </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{q}</span></span><span>x" </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i, (n, q) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">enumerate</span></span><span>(quentes)]) +
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n\n❄️ **ZONAS FRIAS**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">' · '</span></span></span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, frios[:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>]))}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⚖️ **PAR / ÍMPAR**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Par: <span class="hljs-subst">{pares}</span></span></span><span>\nÍmpar: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{impares}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎨 **COR**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Vermelho: <span class="hljs-subst">{verm}</span></span></span><span>\nPreto: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{pret}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"⬆️⬇️ **ALTURA**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"0–18: <span class="hljs-subst">{baixa}</span></span></span><span>\n19–36: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{alta}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 **COLUNAS**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Coluna 1: <span class="hljs-subst">{col_1}</span></span></span><span>\nColuna 2: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{col_2}</span></span><span>\nColuna 3: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{col_3}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📦 **DÚZIAS**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"1ª: <span class="hljs-subst">{d1}</span></span></span><span>\n2ª: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{d2}</span></span><span>\n3ª: </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{d3}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"━━━━━━━━━━━━━━\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🧠 **LEITURA DO BOT**\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"• Mercado equilibrado\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"• Observe atrasos antes da entrada\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🛑 **Gestão:** Stop Win +20% | Stop Loss −30%"</span></span><span>
    )

    bot.send_message(chat, msg, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 $Criptoplay$ rodando 24h..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="5855" data-end="5858">
<h2 data-start="5860" data-end="5894">✅ O QUE VOCÊ FAZ AGORA (RÁPIDO)</h2>
<p data-start="5895" data-end="6052">1️⃣ cola tudo em <code data-start="5912" data-end="5927">criptoplay.py</code><br data-start="5927" data-end="5930">
2️⃣ troca <strong data-start="5940" data-end="5953">API_TOKEN</strong><br data-start="5953" data-end="5956">
3️⃣ troca <strong data-start="5966" data-end="5976">ADMINS</strong><br data-start="5976" data-end="5979">
4️⃣ salva no GitHub<br data-start="5998" data-end="6001">
5️⃣ Railway → <strong data-start="6015" data-end="6025">Deploy</strong><br data-start="6025" data-end="6028">
6️⃣ no grupo: <code data-start="6042" data-end="6050">/start</code></p>
<p data-start="6054" data-end="6105">👉 clica nos números → relatório sai <strong data-start="6091" data-end="6104">a cada 10</strong>.</p>
<hr data-start="6107" data-end="6110">
<p data-start="6112" data-end="6137">Se quiser, próximo nível:</p>
<ul data-start="6138" data-end="6230">
<li data-start="6138" data-end="6160">
<p data-start="6140" data-end="6160">🔔 alertas resumidos</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6161" data-end="6174">
<p data-start="6163" data-end="6174">💎 modo VIP</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6175" data-end="6194">
<p data-start="6177" data-end="6194">📊 ranking diário</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6195" data-end="6230">
<p data-start="6197" data-end="6230">🧠 sugestão automática de entrada</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="6232" data-end="6243" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">É só falar.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 <h1 data-start="374" data-end="426">✅ $Criptoplay$ — VERSÃO FINAL LIMPA E PROFISSIONAL</h1>
<p data-start="428" data-end="459">📌 <strong data-start="431" data-end="443">Arquivo:</strong> <code data-start="444" data-end="459">criptoplay.py</code></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="461" data-end="4400"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Counter

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= CONFIG =================</span></span><span>
API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SEU_TOKEN_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= GRUPOS =================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= ROLETAS =================</span></span><span>
vermelhos = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">7</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">14</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">21</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">34</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
pretos   = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">22</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">31</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>}

col1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">7</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">22</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">31</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">34</span></span><span>}
col2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">11</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">14</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">20</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>}
col3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">21</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= CONTROLE =================</span></span><span>
historico = []
falha_g1 = falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>
ultimas_5 = []
monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= TECLADO =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">teclado</span></span><span>():
    kb = InlineKeyboardMarkup(row_width=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>)
    kb.add(*[InlineKeyboardButton(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i), callback_data=</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(i)) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>)])
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> kb

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= START =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🎰 $Criptoplay$\nClique no número da roleta:"</span></span><span>,
        reply_markup=teclado()
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= CLIQUE =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.callback_query_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> call: </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">clique</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">call</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">global</span></span><span> falha_g1, falha_g2, monitorando, contador_4

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> call.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ADMINS:
        bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Apenas ADM"</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    n = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(call.data)
    historico.append(n)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Grupo 1</span></span><span>
    falha_g1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo1 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> falha_g1 + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g1 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 Alerta: 10 falhas Grupo 1"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Grupo 2</span></span><span>
    falha_g2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> falha_g2 + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> falha_g2 == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 Alerta: 10 falhas Grupo 2"</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Grupo 3</span></span><span>
    ultimas_5.append(n)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimas_5) &gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>:
        ultimas_5.pop(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> monitorando </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> ultimas_5 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> x </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3]) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:
        monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>
        contador_4 = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> monitorando:
        contador_4 += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> grupo3:
            bot.send_message(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚨 Alerta: Repetição Grupo 3"</span></span><span>)
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> contador_4 &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">4</span></span><span>:
            monitorando = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">False</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Relatório</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>:
        analisar(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)
        historico.clear()

    bot.edit_message_reply_markup(call.message.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>, call.message.message_id, reply_markup=teclado())
    bot.answer_callback_query(call.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= ANALISE LIMPA =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">analisar</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">chat</span></span><span>):
    c = Counter(historico)
    quentes = c.most_common(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    frios = [i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> c][:</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>]

    pares = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n != </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> n % </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span> == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
    impares = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(historico) - pares

    verm = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> vermelhos])
    pret = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> pretos])

    baixa = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">18</span></span><span>])
    alta  = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    d1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>])
    d2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24</span></span><span>])
    d3 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>([n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> historico </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span> &lt;= n &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>])

    msg = (
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 Criptoplay (10 rodadas)\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Números: <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">' '</span></span></span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, historico))}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🔥 Quentes: <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">', '</span></span></span></span><span>.join([</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(n) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> n, _ </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> quentes])}\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"❄️ Frios: <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-string">', '</span></span></span></span><span>.join(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">map</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>, frios))}\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Par/Ímpar: <span class="hljs-subst">{pares}</span></span></span><span>/</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{impares}</span></span><span>\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Vermelho/Preto: <span class="hljs-subst">{verm}</span></span></span><span>/</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{pret}</span></span><span>\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Baixa/Alta: <span class="hljs-subst">{baixa}</span></span></span><span>/</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{alta}</span></span><span>\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Dúzias: <span class="hljs-subst">{d1}</span></span></span><span>-</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{d2}</span></span><span>-</span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{d3}</span></span><span>\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Gestão: SW +20% | SL -30%"</span></span><span>
    )

    bot.send_message(chat, msg)

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Criptoplay rodando 24h"</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="4402" data-end="4405">
<h2 data-start="4407" data-end="4428">✅ COMO FICOU AGORA</h2>
<ul data-start="4429" data-end="4553">
<li data-start="4429" data-end="4446">
<p data-start="4431" data-end="4446"><strong data-start="4431" data-end="4446">texto curto</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4447" data-end="4470">
<p data-start="4449" data-end="4470"><strong data-start="4449" data-end="4470">informação direta</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4471" data-end="4496">
<p data-start="4473" data-end="4496"><strong data-start="4473" data-end="4496">sem linhas sobrando</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4497" data-end="4517">
<p data-start="4499" data-end="4517"><strong data-start="4499" data-end="4517">leitura rápida</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4518" data-end="4553">
<p data-start="4520" data-end="4553"><strong data-start="4520" data-end="4553">cara de bot profissional real</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="4555" data-end="4586">Nada embaralhado. Nada confuso.</p>
<hr data-start="4588" data-end="4591">
<p data-start="4593" data-end="4636">Se quiser o <strong data-start="4605" data-end="4628">próximo ajuste fino</strong>, posso:</p>
<ul data-start="4637" data-end="4791">
<li data-start="4637" data-end="4682">
<p data-start="4639" data-end="4682">deixar <strong data-start="4646" data-end="4682">ainda mais compacto (1 bloco só)</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4683" data-end="4712">
<p data-start="4685" data-end="4712">criar <strong data-start="4691" data-end="4712">versão VIP / FREE</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4713" data-end="4752">
<p data-start="4715" data-end="4752">adicionar <strong data-start="4725" data-end="4752">probabilidade destacada</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4753" data-end="4791">
<p data-start="4755" data-end="4791">ou <strong data-start="4758" data-end="4791">mensagem diferente pra alerta</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="4793" data-end="4803" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Só fala 👍</p></div></div></div></div><div class="z-0 flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 tem <strong data-start="43" data-end="67">DOIS PROBLEMAS REAIS</strong> aí, e vou corrigir <strong data-start="87" data-end="97">de vez</strong>, de forma profissional:</p>
<hr data-start="123" data-end="126">
<h2 data-start="128" data-end="174">🔴 PROBLEMA 1 — SEQUÊNCIA APARECE DIFERENTE</h2>
<p data-start="175" data-end="196">Isso acontece porque:</p>
<ul data-start="197" data-end="292">
<li data-start="197" data-end="241">
<p data-start="199" data-end="241">o bot <strong data-start="205" data-end="233">agrupa, ordena ou resume</strong> números</p>
</li>
<li data-start="242" data-end="292">
<p data-start="244" data-end="292">você quer ver <strong data-start="258" data-end="292">EXATAMENTE NA ORDEM QUE CLICOU</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="294" data-end="398">✅ <strong data-start="296" data-end="308">CORREÇÃO</strong>:<br data-start="309" data-end="312">
o histórico passa a ser <strong data-start="336" data-end="349">FIFO puro</strong> (ordem real de entrada), sem ordenar, sem mexer.</p>
<hr data-start="400" data-end="403">
<h2 data-start="405" data-end="454">🔴 PROBLEMA 2 — ALERTA DE SINAL (3–6–9 / 0–10)</h2>
<p data-start="455" data-end="465">Você quer:</p>
<ul data-start="467" data-end="614">
<li data-start="467" data-end="496">
<p data-start="469" data-end="496">quando sair <strong data-start="481" data-end="496">3 ou 6 ou 9</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="497" data-end="525">
<p data-start="499" data-end="525">OU quando sair <strong data-start="514" data-end="525">0 ou 10</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="526" data-end="556">
<p data-start="528" data-end="556">👉 o bot <strong data-start="537" data-end="556">NÃO entra antes</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="557" data-end="614">
<p data-start="559" data-end="614">👉 o bot <strong data-start="568" data-end="614">AVISA PARA ENTRAR DEPOIS DO NÚMERO ENVIADO</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="616" data-end="662">Ou seja:<br data-start="624" data-end="627">
<strong data-start="627" data-end="645">alerta reativo</strong>, não antecipado.</p>
<p data-start="664" data-end="679">✅ <strong data-start="666" data-end="678">CORREÇÃO</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="680" data-end="780">
<li data-start="680" data-end="731">
<p data-start="682" data-end="731">o alerta dispara <strong data-start="699" data-end="731">APÓS o número ser registrado</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="732" data-end="780">
<p data-start="734" data-end="780">mensagem clara: <strong data-start="750" data-end="780">“ENTRAR NA PRÓXIMA RODADA”</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="782" data-end="785">
<h1 data-start="787" data-end="842">✅ CÓDIGO FINAL — SEQUÊNCIA CORRETA + SINAIS AJUSTADOS</h1>
<p data-start="843" data-end="888">📌 <strong data-start="846" data-end="888">substitui seu <code data-start="862" data-end="877">criptoplay.py</code> por ESTE</strong></p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="890" data-end="4805"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> telebot.types </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> InlineKeyboardMarkup, InlineKeyboardButton
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Counter

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= CONFIG =================</span></span><span>
API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_SEU_TOKEN_AQUI"</span></span><span>
bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

ADMINS = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= GRUPOS =================</span></span><span>
grupo1 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">13</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">16</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">29</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">33</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>}
grupo2 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">19</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">15</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">32</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">26</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">35</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">28</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">8</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">23</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}
grupo3 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">27</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">17</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">25</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>}

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># SINAIS ESPECIAIS</span></span><span>
sinal_369 = {</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">6</span></span><span>,</span><span><span class="hljs-number">9</span></span><span>}
