flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[1px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full wrap-break-word light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="165">fechado 🤝<br data-start="10" data-end="13">
vou te entregar <strong data-start="29" data-end="42">UM BOT SÓ</strong>, <strong data-start="44" data-end="60">profissional</strong>, <strong data-start="62" data-end="74">objetivo</strong>, <strong data-start="76" data-end="91">sem bagunça</strong>, <strong data-start="93" data-end="105">sem bugs</strong>, pronto pra <strong data-start="118" data-end="132">rodar hoje</strong> e <strong data-start="135" data-end="164">integrar com o Criptoplay</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="167" data-end="194">👉 ele faz EXATAMENTE isso:</p>
<ul data-start="195" data-end="463">
<li data-start="195" data-end="218">
<p data-start="197" data-end="218">usuário dá <strong data-start="208" data-end="218">/start</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="219" data-end="238">
<p data-start="221" data-end="238">informa <strong data-start="229" data-end="238">banca</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="239" data-end="251">
<p data-start="241" data-end="251">fica ativo</p>
</li>
<li data-start="252" data-end="393">
<p data-start="254" data-end="308">quando chegar <strong data-start="268" data-end="291">sinal 3-6-9 ou 0-10</strong> (do Criptoplay):</p>
<ul data-start="311" data-end="393">
<li data-start="311" data-end="350">
<p data-start="313" data-end="350">calcula <strong data-start="321" data-end="350">FRACA / MÉDIA / AGRESSIVA</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="353" data-end="393">
<p data-start="355" data-end="393">mostra <strong data-start="362" data-end="393">qual opção faz mais sentido</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="394" data-end="463">
<p data-start="396" data-end="463">a cada <strong data-start="403" data-end="429">30 números registrados</strong>, manda <strong data-start="437" data-end="463">tabela 0–36 organizada</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="465" data-end="502">Nada além disso. Limpo. Profissional.</p>
<hr data-start="504" data-end="507">
<h1 data-start="509" data-end="542">🤖 BOT DE GESTÃO — VERSÃO FINAL</h1>
<h2 data-start="544" data-end="584">📌 ONDE COLOCAR OS DADOS (IMPORTANTE)</h2>
<p data-start="585" data-end="618">No começo do código você vai ver:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="620" data-end="736"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span>API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_AQUI_O_TOKEN_DO_BOT_DE_GESTAO"</span></span><span>
CRIPTOPLAY_BOT_ID = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ID do bot Criptoplay</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="738" data-end="826">📍 Token → vem do <strong data-start="756" data-end="770">@BotFather</strong><br data-start="770" data-end="773">
📍 ID → pega com <strong data-start="790" data-end="806">@userinfobot</strong> (manda /start nele)</p>
<hr data-start="828" data-end="831">
<h2 data-start="833" data-end="854">📁 NOME DO ARQUIVO</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="855" data-end="883"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>gestao_criptoplay.py
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="885" data-end="888">
<h2 data-start="890" data-end="925">✅ SCRIPT COMPLETO (COPIA E COLA)</h2>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="927" data-end="3912"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1">python</div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> telebot
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> deque, Counter

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= CONFIG =================</span></span><span>
API_TOKEN = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"COLE_AQUI_O_TOKEN_DO_BOT_DE_GESTAO"</span></span><span>
CRIPTOPLAY_BOT_ID = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">123456789</span></span><span>

bot = telebot.TeleBot(API_TOKEN)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= DADOS =================</span></span><span>
usuarios = {}            </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># user_id -&gt; banca</span></span><span>
ultimos_30 = deque(maxlen=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= START =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">commands=[<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span></span></span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">start</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"💼 *Gestão de Banca — Criptoplay*\n\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Informe o valor da sua banca.\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Exemplo: `67`"</span></span><span>,
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= RECEBE BANCA =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> m: m.text.isdigit(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"></span></span><span>))
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber_banca</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    banca = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">float</span></span><span>(msg.text)
    usuarios[msg.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>] = banca

    bot.send_message(
        msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"✅ Banca registrada: *R$ <span class="hljs-subst">{banca:<span class="hljs-number">.2</span></span></span></span><span>f}*\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Aguarde os sinais."</span></span><span>,
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= RECEBE NÚMEROS (HISTÓRICO) =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> m: m.text.isdigit(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"></span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">m.text</span></span><span>) &lt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">36</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">registrar_numero</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    n = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(msg.text)
    ultimos_30.append(n)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(ultimos_30) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">30</span></span><span>:
        enviar_tabela(msg.chat.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= TABELA 30 RODADAS =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">enviar_tabela</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">chat_id</span></span><span>):
    contagem = Counter(ultimos_30)
    linhas = []

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>):
        linhas.append(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"<span class="hljs-subst">{i:&gt;<span class="hljs-number">2</span></span></span></span><span>} → </span><span><span class="hljs-subst">{contagem.get(i,<span class="hljs-number">0</span></span></span><span>)}x")

    texto = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"📊 *ESTATÍSTICA — ÚLTIMAS 30*\n\n"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> i </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">range</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">37</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>):
        texto += </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" | "</span></span><span>.join(linhas[i:i+</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>]) + </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"\n"</span></span><span>

    bot.send_message(chat_id, texto, parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= RECEBE SINAL DO CRIPTOPLAY =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@bot.message_handler(<span class="hljs-params">func=<span class="hljs-keyword">lambda</span></span></span></span><span> m: m.from_user.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">id</span></span><span> == CRIPTOPLAY_BOT_ID)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">receber_sinal</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span><span>):
    texto = msg.text

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"3-6-9"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> texto:
        estrategia = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"3-6-9"</span></span><span>
        qtd = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"0-10"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> texto:
        estrategia = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"0-10"</span></span><span>
        qtd = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">10</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> user_id, banca </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> usuarios.items():
        enviar_gestao(user_id, banca, estrategia, qtd)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># ================= GESTÃO =================</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">enviar_gestao</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">user_id, banca, estrategia, qtd</span></span><span>):
    fraca = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
    media_total = banca / </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>
    forte_total = banca

    media_num = media_total / qtd
    forte_num = forte_total / qtd

    bot.send_message(
        user_id,
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🎯 *SINAL <span class="hljs-subst">{estrategia}</span></span></span><span>*\n\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"💼 Banca: R$ <span class="hljs-subst">{banca:<span class="hljs-number">.2</span></span></span></span><span>f}\n\n"

        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🟢 *FRACA*\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"R$ 1 por número\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Risco baixo\n\n"</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🟡 *MÉDIA*\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"R$ <span class="hljs-subst">{media_num:<span class="hljs-number">.2</span></span></span></span><span>f} por número\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Usa meia banca\n\n"</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"🔴 *AGRESSIVA*\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"R$ <span class="hljs-subst">{forte_num:<span class="hljs-number">.2</span></span></span></span><span>f} por número\n"
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"Usa banca total\n\n"</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"📌 *Sugestão:* escolha conforme o momento\n"</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-string">f"⚠️ Nunca misture estratégias"</span></span><span>,
        parse_mode=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Markdown"</span></span><span>
    )

</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🤖 Bot de Gestão Criptoplay rodando..."</span></span><span>)
bot.infinity_polling()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3914" data-end="3917">
<h2 data-start="3919" data-end="3949">🚀 COMO RODAR (BEM SIMPLES)</h2>
<p data-start="3950" data-end="4077">1️⃣ cria o bot no <strong data-start="3968" data-end="3981">BotFather</strong><br data-start="3981" data-end="3984">
2️⃣ cola o <strong data-start="3995" data-end="4004">TOKEN</strong><br data-start="4004" data-end="4007">
3️⃣ coloca o <strong data-start="4020" data-end="4040">ID do Criptoplay</strong><br data-start="4040" data-end="4043">
4️⃣ sobe no <strong data-start="4055" data-end="4066">Railway</strong><br data-start="4066" data-end="4069">
5️⃣ roda</p>
<p data-start="4079" data-end="4163">👉 usuário <strong data-start="4090" data-end="4127">tem que iniciar esse bot primeiro</strong><br data-start="4127" data-end="4130">
👉 depois disso tudo é automático</p>
<hr data-start="4165" data-end="4168">
<h2 data-start="4170" data-end="4196">🏆 O QUE VOCÊ TEM AGORA</h2>
<ul data-start="4197" data-end="4316">

</li>

<p data-start="4228" data-end="4258">bot de <strong data-start="4235" data-end="4258">gestão profissional</strong></p>

<p data-start="4261" data-end="4276">histórico 30/30</p>
</li>

<p data-start="4279" data-end="4316">estrutura de <strong data-start="4292" data-end="4316">casa de sinais séria</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>

<hr data-start="177" data-end="180">
<h1 data-start="182" data-end="242">✅ PASSO A PASSO COMPLETO (GITHUB + REQUIREMENTS + RAILWAY)</h1>
<h2 data-start="244" data-end="273">🧩 O QUE VOCÊ VAI PRECISAR</h2>
<p data-start="274" data-end="382">✔ conta no <strong data-start="285" data-end="295">GitHub</strong><br data-start="295" data-end="298">
✔ conta no <strong data-start="309" data-end="320">Railway</strong><br data-start="320" data-end="323">
✔ <strong data-start="325" data-end="341">TOKEN do bot</strong> (BotFather)<br data-start="353" data-end="356">
✔ <strong data-start="358" data-end="382">ID do bot Criptoplay</strong></p>
<hr data-start="384" data-end="387">
<h1 data-start="389" data-end="424">1️⃣ CRIAR O REPOSITÓRIO NO GITHUB</h1>
<ol data-start="426" data-end="518">
<li data-start="426" data-end="452">
<p data-start="429" data-end="452">Entre em <strong data-start="438" data-end="452">github.com</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="453" data-end="484">
<p data-start="456" data-end="484">Clique em <strong data-start="466" data-end="484">New repository</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="485" data-end="518">
<p data-start="488" data-end="518">Nome do repositório (exemplo):</p>
</li>
</ol>
<pre class="overflow-visible! px-0!" data-start="519" data-end="544"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl corner-superellipse/1.1 relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl corner-t-superellipse/1.1"></div><div class="sticky top-[calc(var(--sticky-padding-top)+9*var(--spacing))]"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copiar"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" aria-hidden="true" class="icon-sm"><use href="/cdn/assets/sprites-core-ikipmley.svg#ce3544" fill="currentColor"></use></svg>Copiar código</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span>gestao-criptoplay
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="4" data-start="545" data-end="555">
<li data-start="545" data-end="555">
